cum get wired!: Drop off writings & 2d art for a book on what the feminine means to you. Will be added to book in art piece and later in print. All genders needed. The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.

cum get wired!: We kick off the week with an event to welcome the dusty citizens of Black Rock City home again for another year. Beverages will be flowing and the playlist will include recognizable songs so that everyone can sing out loud and proud. Whether passersby have already been on playa building for days or are road-weary from the journey home, one and all are welcome to kick back, relax, and set the tone for a fantastic week.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 7 PM – 11 PM ']
cum get wired!: This year, Metamorphoses brings big change to Nacho Campo in addition to our proud tradition of Luchador wrestling. Once again, Nacho Campo will welcome Playa guests to enjoy the thrilling, dramatic, art of Luchador wrestling. Those brave (and foolish) enough to suit up will be encouraged to take a turn in the ring and let their inner show person shine. Prior to their match, wrestlers will be given an opportunity to select their own Luchador mascara and choose their wrestler name, persona and finishing move (after being fitted by our Luchadors in one of our many pairs of multi-sized crutches, always a hilarious crowd pleaser.) Our camp will be host to a plethora of beautiful Latin American cultural displays, including a traditional ofrenda that will serve as the launch point for a procession to the temple. On procession day burners of all ages will be invited to paint their faces in the tradition of Muertos and join the parade. New in 2019, our cantina will host daily folk art creation, lead by our wrestlers. Additionally, our cantina will provide a shaded siesta area equipped with hammocks for drowsy participants and an evening fire. We are very excited to offer for the first time, our 24ft. Tower De Fanaticos, a place to climb for a better view, cheer, take photos and enjoy the festivities. Also contributing to the growth of participation, as in prior years, the camp has planned several semi spontaneous evening events including, Kissadillas and Hots and Shots plus space for pop-ups to gift. Our builder will be hosting a series of lectures on designing and building Casitas (tiny houses), as well as sharing his architectural plans for one of his own design as a gift to participants who are interested. Our artist in residence will be displaying several large panels of their work that will be live painted at an art and fire festival prior to the burn on the perimeter of the camp.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Monday, August 26th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM ']
cum get wired!: Tiny Dirty Secret is the third installment of a trifecta of art pieces. Little Dirty Secret in 2017 and Big Dirty Secret in 2018. Everyone has a secret, some dirty, some sad, some funny, and some bad. Secrets are held within are never usually shared with a single soul. Tiny Dirty Secret is a place to quietly and anonymously let go of your secrets 24hrs a day. Those can range from confessions, fears, sexual fantasies, betrayals, crimes, desires, humiliations, abuse, or anything you need to let go of. All cards are kept locked and safe from others so there is no fear of retaliation or negative reactions. We uphold the security and trust and guarantee your secret is Safe at Tiny Dirty Secret. Stay Anonymous, no names or personal info. If you have an emergency or need help, find the nearest ranger. If you would like to talk to someone and make a new friend, we'd be delighted. If so, leave any contact info that you feel comfortable with. Have Fun, Be Safe!

cum get wired!: Our dungeon and staff are open for you to come learn, experience, and practice dungeon sensation play in a supervised safe environment. We encourage beginners and intermediate players or anyone curious about dungeon play to come and explore in our well-equipped dungeon. Our staff is available to teach, demonstrate, and can help facilitate the proper use of all toys such as a variety of floggers (deer, elk, cow, rabbit, rubber band, and horse hair), paddles, crops, feathers, furry mitts, pinwheels and a violet wand. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we like to focus on the lighter more sensual side of dungeon sensation play. We specialize in Floggassage which is the combination of a full body massage using your hands and whole body, as well as, all the dungeon toys such as floggers, feathers, paddles, furry mitts, and more.

cum get wired!: This is a highly participatory workshop where women will make and decorate their own sexy Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the playa. Recyclable aluminum is used to hand hammer a custom fit costume using traditional hand metal working techniques handed down by cultures across the ages. Helpers will be available assist as needed, but past camps have shown that participants were all highly successful and delighted with their costumes and new skills. We will have a “dungeon” façade and props set up in the camp, along with our Giant Green Dragon mutant vehicle for a backdrop for the girls to shoot photos of their completed creations. Prop swords, axes and throne furnished for effect. Also new this year will be a body painting station for painting of “tribal tattoos” and theme- based decorative art for participants and accompanying friends. Think Dragons! A special bonus is our Must be Naked to Ride Life-Size Animatronic Dinosaur. Don't miss it. Workshop will be open daily 8am-noon. Construction takes about 2 hours. All materials gifted of course.

cum get wired!: In 1985 a book called The Ancient Secret of the Fountain of Youth written by Peter Kelder was published which for the first time fully described an exercise program for youthing. This is an exercise program used by Tibetan monks to live long, vibrant and healthy lives. In fact, this book states that many have lived longer than most can imagine by following the program often called the Five Tibetan Rites. The Tibetans claim that these exercises activate and stimulate the seven key chakras that in turn stimulate all the glands of the endocrine system. The endocrine system is responsible for the body's overall functioning and aging process. This means that the Five Rites will affect the functioning of all your organs and systems, including the physical and energetic systems and that includes the aging process. The man who brought these Five Rights out of Tibet stated that performing the Five Rites stimulates the circulation of essential life energy throughout the body.

cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lessons will shred-ucate you. All skill levels welcome. Sk8 gear provided: Sk8boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Come learn to Sk8 on the Playa! For first time skaters instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created programs for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

cum get wired!: What’s more radically self reliant than being able to make your own incredibly unique and oh-so functional playa clothing using all basic, ethical and natural materials, come into our shade and learn an ancient and unique skill. The most ancient of textiles is a marvelous material that can be shaped, moulded and sculpted, repels water and dirt and for these reasons it has a long history of being used for clothing, headwear and footwear. It makes PERFECT playa clothing, is ethical and sustainable! Full outfits can be made with the most simple materials - soap, water, towels, bubble wrap and some wool roving (wool before it's made into yarn) come by and learn the process of making wool into anything you can dream, without the need to sew a single stitch. You will be shown the basic techniques and examples of what can be made, and then have a chance to make your very own wet felt bracelet, a playa momento made from ethical and natural materials and your own hands. Bonus Playa Points – this is the technique used to make wool dreadlocks! Materials provided and space limited

cum get wired!: “Scientists vs. Kafka” is one fifth RPG, half board game, two sevenths puzzle solving, and some random percentage of scavenger hunt! And hopefully your team will be better at math than that, as you play the roles of scientists, defending Black Rock City against the imprecise scourge of philosophy! Or possibly bugs. But secretly, you aim to dominate the city yourself and spread your “Manicfesto” as you assemble the Ultimate Weapon, a 3D “device” assembled from pieces scattered at participating camps across the city. You’ll solve puzzles, go on wacky quests, play immersive games, and precipitate your ambitions. Every successful accomplishment gains you a degree along the Tenure Track, from undergraduate to Emeritus, and ownership of a block on the big board of Black Rock, a lasercut map of our favorite dusty city. Who will spread their Manicfesto block by block from Esplanade to the airport? The maddest scientists with the strongest duct tape, of course! A Mentor will run the game in camp from noon to 3pm every day to assign quests, confirm successful completions, bestow degrees, and spread each team’s Manicfesto onto the BRC map. Teams (or individuals) can pursue quests throughout the city all day and night, however! Participants get to keep their assembled “device” (or the pieces if they get too distracted to finish) and degrees as permanent mementos of how close they came to world domination. And a drink to lament the same.

cum get wired!: Again this year, YOUniversal will offer a Persian Tea House - designed by Gregg Fleishman (Temple 2013). For 8 hours each day (noon ‘til 8pm) we will offer desert-friendly drinks, hot and cold, along with exotic sweets and sour treats, and some parlor games and poetry / fortune telling all based on the Persian culture. PRO TIP: In addition to our daily Teahouse, come by WEDNESDAY NIGHT, when we host an open Persian dinner! We keep serving amazing hot Persian Food, fluffy saffron infused rice with tadeeg, until we are out of food!! Don't miss this truly amazing opportunity to eat yummy Persian food on the playa!! Since our camp consists of mostly veteran burners of Persian descent, we are really good at two things that can be helpful on the playa, hospitality and fun desert dwelling wisdom. We plan on showcasing both for our fellow burners. As such the YOUniversal Persian Tea House will include a daily variety of ancient Persian favorites, time tested to do well in a desert setting: Drinks & Liquids Persian Tea (optionally with Cardamom) Sekanjebin - Honey / Vinegar + Mint drink served with lettuce dip Sharbeteh Albaloo - Sour Elderberry Sherbet Sharbateh Behleemoo - Quince Lime Sherbet Dough - Yogurt Drink Ab-du-khiar - Cold Yogurt, Cucumber, Herbs, Walnuts and Raisins Soup Sweets & Treats Sohan - Persian Saffron Brittle Noon Nokhod-chee - Chick Pea treats Gaz - Nougat like taffy with pistachos embedded Baghlava - Persian Baklava Zulbia / Bamieh - Sugar-Syrupy Dough Sohan Asali - Persian Almond Brittle Shirini e Zaban - Persian Puff Pastry Ranginak - Date and Walnut squares Lavashak - Sweet or Sour Fruit roll-ups of various kinds Poetry and Parlor Games Takhteh Nard - Backgammon Shat-ranj - Chess Hokm - Persian Card Game Hafez Poetry - Fortune Telling Rumi Poetry Readings

The Witch leads a brief meditation to drop everyone into a similar frequency. Participants are invited to identify an element (earth, air, fire, water) that embodies what they are “working on at this time.” The alchemy game unfolds as the groups move around the Medicine Wheel of elements, creating together an expanding, playful expression of their Work. Finally we charge up and seal our Medicine Wheel with a Transformation Celebration in movement and sound. bio: Sherry Aliberti, a multidisciplinary artist in Bend, OR works as an architect by trade and a witchy shamanic artist by heart. Her blessings and facilitations use crystals, soundscapes and movement. She channels games for groups to play with magic and manifestation. It is a Ritual at rainbow cosmic frequency that 5d expands with each participant. --

cum get wired!: Sore back? Stiff muscles? Other aches/pains? Stop by our camp for some relief. We are here to help our fellow Burners maximize their Playa time! TV Liquid Brunch: Camp ShotSki Bar and Snow Bunny Selfie Station
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: The bar is open! Park your bike in our plentiful Ski adorned Bike Racks (leave your skis there too), and belly up front and center to the ShotSki Bar for a shot of ice cold FireBall (the perfect Burner Libation) from one of our fantastic friend-making official SHOTSKIs. It's a wonderful combination of spicy fire and cool refreshment. Have 1 friend? We have a 2 person shotski! Have 2 friends? We have a 3 person shotski! Have 3 fiends? We have a 4 person shotski! Have 3 friends and want to meet 3 more- perhaps some cute sparkleponies? We have a 6 person shotski! Have 11 friends? We even have a TWELVE PERSON SHOTSKI! Have no friends but want to make friends? Our camp of veterans and newbies will join you and entice other burners to be part of the action while we bring a bit of this traditional Sierra fun to the Playa. You don't want to miss the Avalanche when ALL 5 Shotskis (yes I said all 5 shotskis) are raised at the one time! You've heard the stories and they are all true - but bring your ID because we want to keep the Ski Patrol happy, and the slopes safe. While visiting, don’t miss out Shotski Snow Bunny Photo Booth perfect to take pics and selfies in to remember your great time at our camp! We have all the accessories to make your photo on the Playa memorable, complete w/ Skis, Boots, Poles, Bunny Ears and more! Try your balance on our Playa Skis, or just look cute in our various sets of bunny ears. Includes a great backdrop for your pics. We've got lots of shade in the Chalet Lounge to protect you from that midday sun glaring off the snowpack- not to mention provide shelter from the wind and dust if a storm brews. Our gigantic king bed crowned with a Ski Headboard in the chalet loft is the best place to relax after a day of avoiding moguls in deep playa. Grab a board game or just a chair. Like all alpine getaways, it's the time spent relaxing and laughing with friends that can be the most memorable.

cum get wired!: For Virgin Burners and those to want to recommit to authentic participation. Improvisation and BRC aren't so different. In this workshop, we'll play low-pressure collaborative games that connect us as a group. We'll hush up your thinky-thinky mind (you know, the one that comes up with all the reasons for why you can't do something new) and awaken your gut (where courage and inspiration and wildness dwell) And we'll experiment with the practice of  Yes! ['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM ']
cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lessons will shred-ucate you. All skill levels welcome. Sk8 gear provided: Sk8boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Come learn to sk8 on the Playa! For first time skaters instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created programs for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: Giant Ball Sumo Wrestling: 30 minutes of matches beginning at 4:30 pm Giant Ball Couples Counseling at 5:00 pm each day. Main Event: Running of the Balls. Two running games beginning at 5:30 pm All events feature gifts of red bandannas and chilled sangria. Giant Ball Sumo can happen at any time, and often does. Either within our wooden corral or out on the street, two participants square off in a circle, each wearing a giant inflatable ball. Matches usually last only a minute, as the balls get knocked over and roll out of the ring. A taiko drummer provides drama, and there's always one or two ball wranglers on hand to help participants in and out. Couples Counseling, in which two people wearing giant balls (could be more if they're from Poly Paradise!!) try to knock some sense into their partner, with some very non-PC advice being shouted at them by our trained counselors from a bullhorn. Running of the Balls: Each day's activities end with two running games, during which six angry balls are released from our corral into a crowd of red-bandanna-wearing runners. Course flag waivers are positioned around the nearby plaza, and the runners must complete the course and try to survive by not getting knocked down.

cum get wired!: What is The 360 Emergence? We are artists in service to the emergence of each person who shows up in our laboratories. We curate journeys and containers that weave the ever changing human into becoming leader-full and in-sight full. To becoming accountable and fluid. To see from every perspective. We awaken our 10,000 eyes and we ask you to do the same. We are heart activists. The body is our divining rod, music our ally, silence our guide. We seek balance between an inside education that beckons us into an alliance with the outside world. We are steeped in dance, ceremony, literature, fashion, theater, strength, humor, vulnerability and power.

cum get wired!: Pointlessly bureaucratic playa name change service bureau (PBPNCS Bureau): We all know someone with a playa name they wish they didn’t have, now they have an “official” way to apply to change it! Hours will be.... who the fuck knows! (actually we will be serving food during the official hours -cheesey ooey gooey goodness) Applicants must take a number and ring a bell to alert us of their presence. Consented ass paddling will be offered to those waiting. Because let’s make waiting in line more painful, if only all lines came with a good spanking. They may or may not be served in a reasonable amount of time. Once served, applicants must submit to an interview about their former name and desired playa name and fill out a very tedious form. Name change officers are trained to help pull the playa name from the applicant! You may have to perform a task to get your name changed. We will see how the bureaucrats feel. A response letter as a souvenir, and as proof to your camp mates about what you can be called, will be delivered within a very reasonable 3-6 months post burn to their default world address (email or snail mail - again - up to the crats).

cum get wired!: Drop off writings & 2d art for a book on what the feminine means to you. Will be added to book in art piece and later in print. All genders needed. The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.

cum get wired!: Tiny Dirty Secret is the third installment of a trifecta of art pieces. Little Dirty Secret in 2017 and Big Dirty Secret in 2018. Everyone has a secret, some dirty, some sad, some funny, and some bad. Secrets are held within are never usually shared with a single soul. Tiny Dirty Secret is a place to quietly and anonymously let go of your secrets 24hrs a day. Those can range from confessions, fears, sexual fantasies, betrayals, crimes, desires, humiliations, abuse, or anything you need to let go of. All cards are kept locked and safe from others so there is no fear of retaliation or negative reactions. We uphold the security and trust and guarantee your secret is Safe at Tiny Dirty Secret. Stay Anonymous, no names or personal info. If you have an emergency or need help, find the nearest ranger. If you would like to talk to someone and make a new friend, we'd be delighted. If so, leave any contact info that you feel comfortable with. Have Fun, Be Safe!

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 7:30 PM – 7:45 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 7:30 PM – 7:45 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 7:30 PM – 7:45 PM ']
cum get wired!: Tango, with its geometric patterns, body disassociation, sexy pivots, precision footwork, and ultra intricate embellishments combined with the musicality of Argentinian tango music makes the tango one of the most beautiful and enchanting of all dance techniques. I have been practicing with a partner for almost 2 years but, since I wasn’t able to practice countless hours a day with him, I found myself using a ballet barre, or a wall as my “partner”. Several months into practicing at a barre, I had a eureka moment— doing it by myself took on an entirely new form of movement. I was able to practice my embellishments without relying on my partner, and in doing so “Tango at the barre” was born I’ve choreographed a three minute dance that represents what a caterpillar emerging out of its cocoon, and becoming a butterfly would look like-The path to enlightenment is never an easy one. This dance represents not only the caterpillar’s fight to evolve—but all of ours. Set to the whimsical music of Solo Tango Orchestra’s El Hurucan, this piece will represent the birth of Mariposita. Sunset Monday, Tuesday And Wednesday. I will also spend some time teaching anyone who would like to learn some of the movements after the dance.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 8 PM – 8 AM ']
cum get wired!: The Zendo Project is a place where you can find support during particularly challenging or overwhelming experiences, drug-related or otherwise. The Zendo is staffed 24/7 with trained volunteers who offer peer-counseling support for difficult psychological and emotional situations. This is a safe space to land and reconnect with yourself before you head off to your next adventure! The Zendo Project has been providing compassionate Care Services on playa since 2012. Mission The mission of the Zendo Project is to provide a supportive environment and education to help transform difficult psychedelic and psychological experiences into opportunities for learning and growth. Vision We envision a world where communities are engaged in providing safety and support for people having psychedelic and psychological challenges; and harm reduction principles are used foremost to reduce the risks associated with substance use.

cum get wired!: Our dungeon and staff are open for you to come learn, experience, and practice dungeon sensation play in a supervised safe environment. We encourage beginners and intermediate players or anyone curious about dungeon play to come and explore in our well-equipped dungeon. Our staff is available to teach, demonstrate, and can help facilitate the proper use of all toys such as a variety of floggers (deer, elk, cow, rabbit, rubber band, and horse hair), paddles, crops, feathers, furry mitts, pinwheels and a violet wand. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we like to focus on the lighter more sensual side of dungeon sensation play. We specialize in Floggassage which is the combination of a full body massage using your hands and whole body, as well as, all the dungeon toys such as floggers, feathers, paddles, furry mitts, and more.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM ']
cum get wired!: Carousel Zarya is a rotating, interactive art installation and ride. It is hand-powered, driven by human energy, spits fire and smoke into the sky, combined together music and mechanics, arts, poetry, technology and Halloween spirit. Any citizen of Black Rock City, when tired of passive spectacle elsewhere, can come spin the Carousel and become its motor. The energy transmitted from the human motor overflows into the creativity and joy of the spinning people on the platform. They feel like actors on a stage. Everything is there for you! It's a rotating stage for musicians, steam punk pole for dancing girls, the best wooden animals for children, theatre lights, smoke and fire for actors. We will playing authentic cozy funk from 70s on unusual musical instrument— electro hurdy-gurdy AMbox. What is this? It is like a radio but more than a radio. This is the instrument, on which everybody can play own melody.The Carousel Zarya empowers and inspires creativity and collaboration, returning participants to the free-spirited days of childhood and fantasy.

One of the most magical things about this festival (that many attest is “much more than a festival”) is that there is no centralized answer for “why do we burn a Man?” or “what is the idea behind The Temple?” It is up to the citizens of Black Rock City to decide for themselves what this gathering is all about. Is Burning Man “just a party” or is there something more going on with this mysterious jamboree? There is no “correct” answer, but lets share our stories & talk about what we think is going on here.

cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lesson will shre-ucate your aspirating young skater. All skill levels welcome (Boys and Girls) (age 3-7 year old) for the little shredder program for first time skaters. Instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps holding hands. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created little shredder programs (3-7 years old) for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

cum get wired!: Party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our Mighty Ship, the “USS Nevada”, and our infamous ARRGH Bar, open daily from 10:00am to 10:00pm…ish, where we’ll be serving up our special “Se(a)men” and other delicious grogs. Come join us for our 2019 “Theme Parties”. The start of our Party season officially begins on Monday with our “NAKED PIRATE SHOTS” party from Noon to 2pm. Tuesday from 10am to Noon we head down the rabbit hole for our “MAD PIRATE TEA PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, “BLACKBEARD’S BLACKBERRY BASH” serves up our own Blackberry grog. Wednesday from Noon to 2pm, join us for our “MAI TAI PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm we get to wear white with our “WHITE LINEN PARTY”. Thursday from 7am to 9am, stretch out with “MORNING NINYASA YOGA AND MIMOSA”, then from Noon to 2pm our bartender’s “booty” will be on display at our “BOOTY SHORTS PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm our lovely lasses will dazzle you at the “WICKED WENCHES PARTY”, and 4pm to 6pm, our “PIRATES AND MERMAIDS PARTY”. Friday from Noon to 2pm, join us for some “SUNKEN TREASURE TASTY TREATS, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “PIRATE COWBOY PARTY” shows that Pirates are just Cowboys with a different hat. Saturday from 7am to 9am start the day with “MORNING VINYASA YOGA AND SUNRISE SIPPERS”, and then from Noon to 2pm, embrace your inner Basque with our “PICON PUNCH PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “DRAG BALL FASHION SHOW” will surely inspire ALL Kings and Queens. Finally, on Sunday from 10am to Noon, we bring an end to the party with our amazing “BLOODY MARY PARTY”! Daily, we will have morning coffee, and throughout the week we will be hosting Burlesque lessons, Pole Dancing demonstrations, Flogging demonstrations, body painting and more! We also have an awesome “Chill space” with lots of couches and shade, a Wayward Wenches Bazaar, where you can pick up that much needed item, great music, and a rowdy crew of Wenches and Pirates that are always up for the best time possible as we “Belly up to the bar

cum get wired!: Again this year, YOUniversal will offer a Persian Tea House - designed by Gregg Fleishman (Temple 2013). For 8 hours each day (noon ‘til 8pm) we will offer desert-friendly drinks, hot and cold, along with exotic sweets and sour treats, and some parlor games and poetry / fortune telling all based on the Persian culture. PRO TIP: In addition to our daily Teahouse, come by WEDNESDAY NIGHT, when we host an open Persian dinner! We keep serving amazing hot Persian Food, fluffy saffron infused rice with tadeeg, until we are out of food!! Don't miss this truly amazing opportunity to eat yummy Persian food on the playa!! Since our camp consists of mostly veteran burners of Persian descent, we are really good at two things that can be helpful on the playa, hospitality and fun desert dwelling wisdom. We plan on showcasing both for our fellow burners. As such the YOUniversal Persian Tea House will include a daily variety of ancient Persian favorites, time tested to do well in a desert setting: Drinks & Liquids Persian Tea (optionally with Cardamom) Sekanjebin - Honey / Vinegar + Mint drink served with lettuce dip Sharbeteh Albaloo - Sour Elderberry Sherbet Sharbateh Behleemoo - Quince Lime Sherbet Dough - Yogurt Drink Ab-du-khiar - Cold Yogurt, Cucumber, Herbs, Walnuts and Raisins Soup Sweets & Treats Sohan - Persian Saffron Brittle Noon Nokhod-chee - Chick Pea treats Gaz - Nougat like taffy with pistachos embedded Baghlava - Persian Baklava Zulbia / Bamieh - Sugar-Syrupy Dough Sohan Asali - Persian Almond Brittle Shirini e Zaban - Persian Puff Pastry Ranginak - Date and Walnut squares Lavashak - Sweet or Sour Fruit roll-ups of various kinds Poetry and Parlor Games Takhteh Nard - Backgammon Shat-ranj - Chess Hokm - Persian Card Game Hafez Poetry - Fortune Telling Rumi Poetry Readings

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM ']
cum get wired!: “Scientists vs. Kafka” is one fifth RPG, half board game, two sevenths puzzle solving, and some random percentage of scavenger hunt! And hopefully your team will be better at math than that, as you play the roles of scientists, defending Black Rock City against the imprecise scourge of philosophy! Or possibly bugs. But secretly, you aim to dominate the city yourself and spread your “Manicfesto” as you assemble the Ultimate Weapon, a 3D “device” assembled from pieces scattered at participating camps across the city. You’ll solve puzzles, go on wacky quests, play immersive games, and precipitate your ambitions. Every successful accomplishment gains you a degree along the Tenure Track, from undergraduate to Emeritus, and ownership of a block on the big board of Black Rock, a lasercut map of our favorite dusty city. Who will spread their Manicfesto block by block from Esplanade to the airport? The maddest scientists with the strongest duct tape, of course! A Mentor will run the game in camp from noon to 3pm every day to assign quests, confirm successful completions, bestow degrees, and spread each team’s Manicfesto onto the BRC map. Teams (or individuals) can pursue quests throughout the city all day and night, however! Participants get to keep their assembled “device” (or the pieces if they get too distracted to finish) and degrees as permanent mementos of how close they came to world domination. And a drink to lament the same.

cum get wired!: This workshop starts with an explanation of the vision and creation of the first-ever urban eco-village that I am a nonprofit board member, grant writer, yoga teacher and pre-school teacher for. I will continue with a series of questions that spark open discussion about how to create your own, how it functions, acquiring funds and building sacred and fun space for every community. The workshop will end with a meditation and collective deep breaths together with the intention of feeling inspired from this time together to go back into the default world and create positive, impactful change for their community. I encourage all changemakers to come to this workshop who feel called to learn more and connect.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: You know what the playa doesn't have? A cat cafe. You know, those cafes where adoptable cats charm, delight, and annoy you while you are sipping a cold beverage? Well, earth cats may find the playa inhospitable, but SPACEcats are very well adapted to its harsh terrain. After the metamorphosis from Human to Space Cat in our SPACE CAT SOUNDBATH (11:30am), our new feline friends are invited to take part in our Space Cat Cafe with us. You know, flick their tails around and arch their backs, get used to their new physical forms. Thai iced tea and treats will be served to humans and spacecats alike. Cat toys will be available to distract us. Speaking of which, are you not into interstellar felines? Scared of Aliens? Allergic to cats (or humans who wear cat costumes?) No problem! Skip the Human to Space Cat conversion process and join us for Thai Iced Tea and treats in the space ship and in our public shaded cafe. Maybe you'll come for a drink and end up adopting a spacecat. It's the playa, who knows?!?!?!?! If you're lucky, you'll be at our cafe when Mac and Joon are on-site with their INFORMATION/INTUITION BOOTH. Have a question? Participants who approach the booth will be given the choice between Information from Mac who will be present with books and a myriad of facts OR they can select Joon to intuit an answer. She will meditate and offer them a response. Answers may not be available at this time, answers may be too personal to get a clear read, or answers may come spontaneously. Participants will be advised well and approached with both humor and depth. Mac and Joon intend to bring a balance between Science and the Mystical.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: The bar is open! Park your bike in our plentiful Ski adorned Bike Racks (leave your skis there too), and belly up front and center to the ShotSki Bar for a shot of ice cold FireBall (the perfect Burner Libation) from one of our fantastic friend-making official SHOTSKIs. It's a wonderful combination of spicy fire and cool refreshment. Have 1 friend? We have a 2 person shotski! Have 2 friends? We have a 3 person shotski! Have 3 fiends? We have a 4 person shotski! Have 3 friends and want to meet 3 more- perhaps some cute sparkleponies? We have a 6 person shotski! Have 11 friends? We even have a TWELVE PERSON SHOTSKI! Have no friends but want to make friends? Our camp of veterans and newbies will join you and entice other burners to be part of the action while we bring a bit of this traditional Sierra fun to the Playa. You don't want to miss the Avalanche when ALL 5 Shotskis (yes I said all 5 shotskis) are raised at the one time! You've heard the stories and they are all true - but bring your ID because we want to keep the Ski Patrol happy, and the slopes safe. While visiting, don’t miss out Shotski Snow Bunny Photo Booth perfect to take pics and selfies in to remember your great time at our camp! We have all the accessories to make your photo on the Playa memorable, complete w/ Skis, Boots, Poles, Bunny Ears and more! Try your balance on our Playa Skis, or just look cute in our various sets of bunny ears. Includes a great backdrop for your pics. We've got lots of shade in the Chalet Lounge to protect you from that midday sun glaring off the snowpack- not to mention provide shelter from the wind and dust if a storm brews. Our gigantic king bed crowned with a Ski Headboard in the chalet loft is the best place to relax after a day of avoiding moguls in deep playa. Grab a board game or just a chair. Like all alpine getaways, it's the time spent relaxing and laughing with friends that can be the most memorable.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 3 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: Have you ever found yourself... - wanting to express dissatisfaction at someone’s behaviour but refrained from doing so in order not to cause an upset? - Appreciating an action or words of someone yet refrained from expressing gratitude to that person? - Expressing dissatisfaction at someone’s behaviour only to find that the situation deteriorated instead of improved? If you can relate to these questions, this workshop may be right for you! It aims to provide you with an effective model to reformulate your communication and thereby enrich your, and your surroundings’ lives. Meaningful and life-enriching communication is much simpler and more rewarding than you may have previously believed. The workshop presents a model called Non-Violent-Communication, which was developed by Marshall Rosenberg.

Participants will shoot and/or star in video footage set to the iconic feel-good song All You Need Is Love by the Beatles. ['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM ']
cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lessons will shred-ucate you. All skill levels welcome. Sk8 gear provided: Sk8boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Come learn to sk8 on the Playa! For first time skaters instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created programs for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

cum get wired!: Giant Ball Sumo Wrestling: 30 minutes of matches beginning at 4:30 pm Giant Ball Couples Counseling at 5:00 pm each day. Main Event: Running of the Balls. Two running games beginning at 5:30 pm All events feature gifts of red bandannas and chilled sangria. Giant Ball Sumo can happen at any time, and often does. Either within our wooden corral or out on the street, two participants square off in a circle, each wearing a giant inflatable ball. Matches usually last only a minute, as the balls get knocked over and roll out of the ring. A taiko drummer provides drama, and there's always one or two ball wranglers on hand to help participants in and out. Couples Counseling, in which two people wearing giant balls (could be more if they're from Poly Paradise!!) try to knock some sense into their partner, with some very non-PC advice being shouted at them by our trained counselors from a bullhorn. Running of the Balls: Each day's activities end with two running games, during which six angry balls are released from our corral into a crowd of red-bandanna-wearing runners. Course flag waivers are positioned around the nearby plaza, and the runners must complete the course and try to survive by not getting knocked down.

cum get wired!: Pointlessly bureaucratic playa name change service bureau (PBPNCS Bureau): We all know someone with a playa name they wish they didn’t have, now they have an “official” way to apply to change it! Hours will be.... who the fuck knows! (actually we will be serving food during the official hours -cheesey ooey gooey goodness) Applicants must take a number and ring a bell to alert us of their presence. Consented ass paddling will be offered to those waiting. Because let’s make waiting in line more painful, if only all lines came with a good spanking. They may or may not be served in a reasonable amount of time. Once served, applicants must submit to an interview about their former name and desired playa name and fill out a very tedious form. Name change officers are trained to help pull the playa name from the applicant! You may have to perform a task to get your name changed. We will see how the bureaucrats feel. A response letter as a souvenir, and as proof to your camp mates about what you can be called, will be delivered within a very reasonable 3-6 months post burn to their default world address (email or snail mail - again - up to the crats).

cum get wired!: …”How Sweet it is!”… “…angelic, primal, orgasmic whisperings immersed in funky beats called freedom.” - Sugar brings you her sweet and sensuous sounds, propelling you to the next level with her provocative mystical vocals and tribal dance movements. Sugar Kayne’s music wraps itself around you, sending you on a time traveling journey into raw, rapturous regions. The Great Smokey Mountains of North Carolina claim her as a native child of Cherokee descent. She stalks the stage like a hunter after its prey, touching audiences in ways not often explored. Her unvarnished, throaty vocals deliver an other worldly quality that comes from traveling through the spirit world, combining primal rhythms with technology; blending drumming and synthesizer to create raw elements with unhurried bass lines. Sugar Kayne embodies the exotic bohemian, subverting the main stream while she emerges as a cutting edge innovator in music.

cum get wired!: Drop off writings & 2d art for a book on what the feminine means to you. Will be added to book in art piece and later in print. All genders needed. The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.

cum get wired!: Tiny Dirty Secret is the third installment of a trifecta of art pieces. Little Dirty Secret in 2017 and Big Dirty Secret in 2018. Everyone has a secret, some dirty, some sad, some funny, and some bad. Secrets are held within are never usually shared with a single soul. Tiny Dirty Secret is a place to quietly and anonymously let go of your secrets 24hrs a day. Those can range from confessions, fears, sexual fantasies, betrayals, crimes, desires, humiliations, abuse, or anything you need to let go of. All cards are kept locked and safe from others so there is no fear of retaliation or negative reactions. We uphold the security and trust and guarantee your secret is Safe at Tiny Dirty Secret. Stay Anonymous, no names or personal info. If you have an emergency or need help, find the nearest ranger. If you would like to talk to someone and make a new friend, we'd be delighted. If so, leave any contact info that you feel comfortable with. Have Fun, Be Safe!

cum get wired!: Tango, with its geometric patterns, body disassociation, sexy pivots, precision footwork, and ultra intricate embellishments combined with the musicality of Argentinian tango music makes the tango one of the most beautiful and enchanting of all dance techniques. I have been practicing with a partner for almost 2 years but, since I wasn’t able to practice countless hours a day with him, I found myself using a ballet barre, or a wall as my “partner”. Several months into practicing at a barre, I had a eureka moment— doing it by myself took on an entirely new form of movement. I was able to practice my embellishments without relying on my partner, and in doing so “Tango at the barre” was born I’ve choreographed a three minute dance that represents what a caterpillar emerging out of its cocoon, and becoming a butterfly would look like-The path to enlightenment is never an easy one. This dance represents not only the caterpillar’s fight to evolve—but all of ours. Set to the whimsical music of Solo Tango Orchestra’s El Hurucan, this piece will represent the birth of Mariposita. Sunset Monday, Tuesday And Wednesday. I will also spend some time teaching anyone who would like to learn some of the movements after the dance.

cum get wired!: *We will show you what it’s like to Herd Cats. This will be one of our more spontaneous events because we are led the crowd yet we are the crowd. We will host a playa pub crawl starting at our cocktail bar and venturing out into the unknown, meeting new friends along the way and taking them with us on our adventure. It’s important to take into consideration that on the playa, the best times are not always planned out. We want to hear people's suggestions where they want to go or if something interesting happens along the way, then we just go with it. During this event we can actively encourage people along the way to join in on the fun. It's an easy way to get a Yes out of someone who normally wouldn't want to participate in activities. Our playa pub crawl will (eventually) lead back to our Cat Lounge for socializing, cat napping or our favorite bar game, Cat Hole. Cat ears will be gifted to those who herd along. No cat left behind!

cum get wired!: Our dungeon and staff are open for you to come learn, experience, and practice dungeon sensation play in a supervised safe environment. We encourage beginners and intermediate players or anyone curious about dungeon play to come and explore in our well-equipped dungeon. Our staff is available to teach, demonstrate, and can help facilitate the proper use of all toys such as a variety of floggers (deer, elk, cow, rabbit, rubber band, and horse hair), paddles, crops, feathers, furry mitts, pinwheels and a violet wand. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we like to focus on the lighter more sensual side of dungeon sensation play. We specialize in Floggassage which is the combination of a full body massage using your hands and whole body, as well as, all the dungeon toys such as floggers, feathers, paddles, furry mitts, and more.

It is hand-powered, driven by human energy, spits fire and smoke into the sky, combined together music and mechanics, arts, poetry, technology and Halloween spirit. Any citizen of Black Rock City, when tired of passive spectacle elsewhere, can come spin the Carousel and become its motor. The energy transmitted from the human motor overflows into the creativity and joy of the spinning people on the platform. They feel like actors on a stage. Everything is there for you! It's a rotating stage for musicians, steam punk pole for dancing girls, the best wooden animals for children, theatre lights, smoke and fire for actors. We will playing authentic cozy funk from 70s on unusual musical instrument— electro hurdy-gurdy AMbox. What is this? It is like a radio but more than a radio. This is the instrument, on which everybody can play own melody.The Carousel Zarya empowers and inspires creativity and collaboration, returning participants to the free-spirited days of childhood and fantasy.

cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lessons will shred-ucate you. All skill levels welcome. Sk8 gear provided: Sk8boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Come learn to Sk8 on the Playa! For first time skaters instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created programs for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

cum get wired!: In 1985 a book called The Ancient Secret of the Fountain of Youth written by Peter Kelder was published which for the first time fully described an exercise program for youthing. This is an exercise program used by Tibetan monks to live long, vibrant and healthy lives. In fact, this book states that many have lived longer than most can imagine by following the program often called the Five Tibetan Rites. The Tibetans claim that these exercises activate and stimulate the seven key chakras that in turn stimulate all the glands of the endocrine system. The endocrine system is responsible for the body's overall functioning and aging process. This means that the Five Rites will affect the functioning of all your organs and systems, including the physical and energetic systems and that includes the aging process. The man who brought these Five Rights out of Tibet stated that performing the Five Rites stimulates the circulation of essential life energy throughout the body.

cum get wired!: Help bring inspiration and beauty to the people of the playa! Participate in the creation of a 24 foot long explosion of artistic expression. Bring yourself on over and paint something. You can’t draw? We welcome blobs and stick figures. You can paint over things or add to things or make new things. Paint as much as you like or sit back and watch on our viewing benches. All brushes and paint for the wall are provided, all we need is you! Lights will be on for enhanced evening viewing. Watch the painting change as the lights change color. On Saturday the wall will be dismantled. The 8 individual canvases which comprised the 24 foot wall will be randomly gifted to citizens of the community. These amazing gifts hold the work of hundreds of passing artists, creating magic memories of BRC 2019!

TV Liquid Brunch: How to Roast Coffee Beans (in Silicon Village)
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 10 AM – 11 AM ']
cum get wired!: Anyone can drink coffee, but how to Roast Coffee Beans for that Ultimate Satisfying cup of Joe is this class. The green coffee bean is actually the seed from a flower and tree which is processed and dried. Roasting coffee beans is simple, yet it takes a little practice…just like everything else…in order to perfect it. There are programmable roasters which make the whole process as simple as turning a dial and pressing a couple of buttons. These start at a little more than a hundred dollars and go up from there. The “Whirley Pop” which I will demonstrate here costs around $40. This air roasting method works like popping popcorn. There is a hand crank which turns a small metal paddle and keeps the beans moving so that they do not overheat and burn. You’ll also need a measuring cup to measure ½ cup of the beans and a large metal bowl to allow the beans to cool off and degas. Taught by the bean master himself, Pacer.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM ']
cum get wired!: “Scientists vs. Kafka” is one fifth RPG, half board game, two sevenths puzzle solving, and some random percentage of scavenger hunt! And hopefully your team will be better at math than that, as you play the roles of scientists, defending Black Rock City against the imprecise scourge of philosophy! Or possibly bugs. But secretly, you aim to dominate the city yourself and spread your “Manicfesto” as you assemble the Ultimate Weapon, a 3D “device” assembled from pieces scattered at participating camps across the city. You’ll solve puzzles, go on wacky quests, play immersive games, and precipitate your ambitions. Every successful accomplishment gains you a degree along the Tenure Track, from undergraduate to Emeritus, and ownership of a block on the big board of Black Rock, a lasercut map of our favorite dusty city. Who will spread their Manicfesto block by block from Esplanade to the airport? The maddest scientists with the strongest duct tape, of course! A Mentor will run the game in camp from noon to 3pm every day to assign quests, confirm successful completions, bestow degrees, and spread each team’s Manicfesto onto the BRC map. Teams (or individuals) can pursue quests throughout the city all day and night, however! Participants get to keep their assembled “device” (or the pieces if they get too distracted to finish) and degrees as permanent mementos of how close they came to world domination. And a drink to lament the same.

cum get wired!: Again this year, YOUniversal will offer a Persian Tea House - designed by Gregg Fleishman (Temple 2013). For 8 hours each day (noon ‘til 8pm) we will offer desert-friendly drinks, hot and cold, along with exotic sweets and sour treats, and some parlor games and poetry / fortune telling all based on the Persian culture. PRO TIP: In addition to our daily Teahouse, come by WEDNESDAY NIGHT, when we host an open Persian dinner! We keep serving amazing hot Persian Food, fluffy saffron infused rice with tadeeg, until we are out of food!! Don't miss this truly amazing opportunity to eat yummy Persian food on the playa!! Since our camp consists of mostly veteran burners of Persian descent, we are really good at two things that can be helpful on the playa, hospitality and fun desert dwelling wisdom. We plan on showcasing both for our fellow burners. As such the YOUniversal Persian Tea House will include a daily variety of ancient Persian favorites, time tested to do well in a desert setting: Drinks & Liquids Persian Tea (optionally with Cardamom) Sekanjebin - Honey / Vinegar + Mint drink served with lettuce dip Sharbeteh Albaloo - Sour Elderberry Sherbet Sharbateh Behleemoo - Quince Lime Sherbet Dough - Yogurt Drink Ab-du-khiar - Cold Yogurt, Cucumber, Herbs, Walnuts and Raisins Soup Sweets & Treats Sohan - Persian Saffron Brittle Noon Nokhod-chee - Chick Pea treats Gaz - Nougat like taffy with pistachos embedded Baghlava - Persian Baklava Zulbia / Bamieh - Sugar-Syrupy Dough Sohan Asali - Persian Almond Brittle Shirini e Zaban - Persian Puff Pastry Ranginak - Date and Walnut squares Lavashak - Sweet or Sour Fruit roll-ups of various kinds Poetry and Parlor Games Takhteh Nard - Backgammon Shat-ranj - Chess Hokm - Persian Card Game Hafez Poetry - Fortune Telling Rumi Poetry Readings

TV Liquid Brunch: Auditory Festival Survival Guide with Miche naziri
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12 PM – 1 PM ']
cum get wired!: Learn what low bass music is doing to your mind, body, and ears and how to protect your hearing! This concept was brought to my attention after attending endless EDM-centered music festivals and noticing the sensation I was experiencing, specifically from the subs. The sound of my entire body shaking and feeling my intestines from the inside. It's an experience that makes the EDM experience interactive but I also wondered what exactly are the aftereffects of this sound onto the mind, body, and ears. So, I took it upon myself to interview some of the most prestigious R&D audio engineers, Front of House/ Monitor Engineers, Audiologists, and System technicians to discover what these affects are and what professionals are doing to help alleviate these symptoms as well as what an average attendee can do to protect their hearing. In this workshop, you will learn a bit about the frequency and decibel range, how every person hears differently in this world, the loudness wars, what happens to your mind, body, and ears, and what you can do to protect your hearing. In the USA, we do not have any auditory regulations or education on what happens to our ears. By attending this workshop, you are expanding your horizons and education to elongate your festival experiences for many years to come.

cum get wired!: You know what the playa doesn't have? A cat cafe. You know, those cafes where adoptable cats charm, delight, and annoy you while you are sipping a cold beverage? Well, earth cats may find the playa inhospitable, but SPACEcats are very well adapted to its harsh terrain. After the metamorphosis from Human to Space Cat in our SPACE CAT SOUNDBATH (11:30am), our new feline friends are invited to take part in our Space Cat Cafe with us. You know, flick their tails around and arch their backs, get used to their new physical forms. Thai iced tea and treats will be served to humans and spacecats alike. Cat toys will be available to distract us. Speaking of which, are you not into interstellar felines? Scared of Aliens? Allergic to cats (or humans who wear cat costumes?) No problem! Skip the Human to Space Cat conversion process and join us for Thai Iced Tea and treats in the space ship and in our public shaded cafe. Maybe you'll come for a drink and end up adopting a spacecat. It's the playa, who knows?!?!?!?! If you're lucky, you'll be at our cafe when Mac and Joon are on-site with their INFORMATION/INTUITION BOOTH. Have a question? Participants who approach the booth will be given the choice between Information from Mac who will be present with books and a myriad of facts OR they can select Joon to intuit an answer. She will meditate and offer them a response. Answers may not be available at this time, answers may be too personal to get a clear read, or answers may come spontaneously. Participants will be advised well and approached with both humor and depth. Mac and Joon intend to bring a balance between Science and the Mystical.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 1:30 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 1:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: This workshop starts with an explanation of the vision and creation of the first-ever urban eco-village that I am a nonprofit board member, grant writer, yoga teacher and pre-school teacher for. I will continue with a series of questions that spark open discussion about how to create your own, how it functions, acquiring funds and building sacred and fun space for every community. The workshop will end with a meditation and collective deep breaths together with the intention of feeling inspired from this time together to go back into the default world and create positive, impactful change for their community. I encourage all changemakers to come to this workshop who feel called to learn more and connect.

The Witch leads a brief meditation to drop everyone into a similar frequency. Finally we charge up and seal our Medicine Wheel with a Transformation Celebration in movement and sound. bio: Sherry Aliberti, a multidisciplinary artist in Bend, OR works as an architect by trade and a witchy shamanic artist by heart. Her blessings and facilitations use crystals, soundscapes and movement. She channels games for groups to play with magic and manifestation. It is a Ritual at rainbow cosmic frequency that 5d expands with each participant. --

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: The bar is open! Park your bike in our plentiful Ski adorned Bike Racks (leave your skis there too), and belly up front and center to the ShotSki Bar for a shot of ice cold FireBall (the perfect Burner Libation) from one of our fantastic friend-making official SHOTSKIs. It's a wonderful combination of spicy fire and cool refreshment. Have 1 friend? We have a 2 person shotski! Have 2 friends? We have a 3 person shotski! Have 3 fiends? We have a 4 person shotski! Have 3 friends and want to meet 3 more- perhaps some cute sparkleponies? We have a 6 person shotski! Have 11 friends? We even have a TWELVE PERSON SHOTSKI! Have no friends but want to make friends? Our camp of veterans and newbies will join you and entice other burners to be part of the action while we bring a bit of this traditional Sierra fun to the Playa. You don't want to miss the Avalanche when ALL 5 Shotskis (yes I said all 5 shotskis) are raised at the one time! You've heard the stories and they are all true - but bring your ID because we want to keep the Ski Patrol happy, and the slopes safe. While visiting, don’t miss out Shotski Snow Bunny Photo Booth perfect to take pics and selfies in to remember your great time at our camp! We have all the accessories to make your photo on the Playa memorable, complete w/ Skis, Boots, Poles, Bunny Ears and more! Try your balance on our Playa Skis, or just look cute in our various sets of bunny ears. Includes a great backdrop for your pics. We've got lots of shade in the Chalet Lounge to protect you from that midday sun glaring off the snowpack- not to mention provide shelter from the wind and dust if a storm brews. Our gigantic king bed crowned with a Ski Headboard in the chalet loft is the best place to relax after a day of avoiding moguls in deep playa. Grab a board game or just a chair. Like all alpine getaways, it's the time spent relaxing and laughing with friends that can be the most memorable.

cum get wired!: The future of communication is now... and, it is actually requires that we rediscover our primitive instincts and abilities. Do we hide behind our words? Often trust our feeling more than the words we are hearing? Wish we were heard and seen on a deeper level? What if more articulate wasn't necessarily better? How can we be more real, more authentic, more clear in our relationships? We have the ability to know and be known much more effectively than we have the current permission and practices to engage with. So what is missing? Rather than just speaking and listening, we will abe 'transmitting and receiving'... Share the most 'amazing story' in seven words or less. Have silent 'conversations'. Discover the magic of a 'silent date'. Change your communication, change your life. Experience curated by somatic explorer & adventurer John Michael (Pleasure).

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6 PM ']
cum get wired!: Calling all women skaters, and women curious about skateboarding, for this evening evening celebration. All ages welcome! Sk8 gear provided: Sk8boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Let’s shred at the Burn together. GIRL POWER! Our Sk8 lessons will shred-ucate you. All skill levels welcome (girls). For first time skaters, instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He has run and created programs for skate camps, with Parks & Recreation, in Santa Barbara and Scotts Valley, California. Pike’s attention to detail, combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating, make this playa series a great place to learn. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike, to teach up to safety standards. Skateboarding is very therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s Sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and look at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of the lessons, and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwards to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to Sk8 Kamp, please sign in at the Sk8 Kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch”. Look for skaters in t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

cum get wired!: Looking for a souvenir cup from Burning Man 2019? You know if you remember the bar you didn't do it justice. Every year since 2006 dusty, thirsty and weary cocktail kings and queens have forgotten what (and often who) they did but ended up with a famous Sharkey’s Bar bar cup. They’re a real collectors item. Stop by and ask for one and if you ask nicely (or at least make us laugh) we'll throw in a special Sharkey's Bar & Lounge cocktail of the day.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: Giant Ball Sumo Wrestling: 30 minutes of matches beginning at 4:30 pm Giant Ball Couples Counseling at 5:00 pm each day. Main Event: Running of the Balls. Two running games beginning at 5:30 pm All events feature gifts of red bandannas and chilled sangria. Giant Ball Sumo can happen at any time, and often does. Either within our wooden corral or out on the street, two participants square off in a circle, each wearing a giant inflatable ball. Matches usually last only a minute, as the balls get knocked over and roll out of the ring. A taiko drummer provides drama, and there's always one or two ball wranglers on hand to help participants in and out. Couples Counseling, in which two people wearing giant balls (could be more if they're from Poly Paradise!!) try to knock some sense into their partner, with some very non-PC advice being shouted at them by our trained counselors from a bullhorn. Running of the Balls: Each day's activities end with two running games, during which six angry balls are released from our corral into a crowd of red-bandanna-wearing runners. Course flag waivers are positioned around the nearby plaza, and the runners must complete the course and try to survive by not getting knocked down.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 5:15 PM – 6:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: Breathwork is a simple breathing technique that assists in processing trauma, developing healthier thought patterns, and creating a new perspective on old behavior. This two-stage rhythm helps calm the brain and allows participants to experience a more tangible connection to their bodies. This practice allows participants to become more aware of buried emotion and deep-seated trauma while identifying the necessary steps toward healing those wounds. Because breathwork doesn’t depend on conscious thought, it is able to successfully circumnavigate the defense mechanisms and roadblocks typically encountered during conventional talk therapy and, often after just one session, participants are able to see and feel the nurturing effects. Breathwork isn’t magic, though it sometimes can feel exactly that. This breathing techniques ultimately distracts the mind long enough to provide participants with a respite from its incessant chatter and desperation to “figure it all out.” Results vary from person to person, but most clients report a reduced level of anxiety, a sense of being consciously present and connected, and in many cases having had “a spiritual experience” — often for the very first time. Self-judgment is reduced, self-love is achieved, and most importantly, participants gain awareness that they have the power to generate the same sense of relief that they had previously only been able to find by using ineffective coping mechanisms.

The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.

TV Liquid Brunch: Latihan - Tune in to yourself and others
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 6 PM – 7:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: I tune in. Inside myself. I let the music be a medium to go deeper, and listen to the movements that come. I follow them. I feel bodies around me. Some brushing, some asking. Some are exploring the limits of their own environments. Others want to connect. Briefly, longer. I meet some. I move away from others. I tune in the physical sensations. Learn to accept them and let go of stories that sometimes float through my mind. Coming back to the sensations. I feel bodies around me. I have grown to know them now. My tribe. I don’t know them all, or not so well. But I know the tribe. I love them and they love me. These sensations are saying – we accept you. And then when new movements arise, I move away. It is time to let go of the security the bodies provide, fly on my own, move into pure darkness and uncertainty. Not knowing where I am going on my own. Not knowing how long I will be alone for. And embracing it. Taking risks. Trusting. And before I know it, I encounter new bodies. More souls who want to go where I go, eager to connect if I desire. I couldn’t see them and they couldn’t see me. But by moving away I connected anew. Latihan is the practice of life. Of embracing instinct. Of embracing trust.

cum get wired!: Tiny Dirty Secret is the third installment of a trifecta of art pieces. Little Dirty Secret in 2017 and Big Dirty Secret in 2018. Everyone has a secret, some dirty, some sad, some funny, and some bad. Secrets are held within are never usually shared with a single soul. Tiny Dirty Secret is a place to quietly and anonymously let go of your secrets 24hrs a day. Those can range from confessions, fears, sexual fantasies, betrayals, crimes, desires, humiliations, abuse, or anything you need to let go of. All cards are kept locked and safe from others so there is no fear of retaliation or negative reactions. We uphold the security and trust and guarantee your secret is Safe at Tiny Dirty Secret. Stay Anonymous, no names or personal info. If you have an emergency or need help, find the nearest ranger. If you would like to talk to someone and make a new friend, we'd be delighted. If so, leave any contact info that you feel comfortable with. Have Fun, Be Safe!

cum get wired!: Tango, with its geometric patterns, body disassociation, sexy pivots, precision footwork, and ultra intricate embellishments combined with the musicality of Argentinian tango music makes the tango one of the most beautiful and enchanting of all dance techniques. I have been practicing with a partner for almost 2 years but, since I wasn’t able to practice countless hours a day with him, I found myself using a ballet barre, or a wall as my “partner”. Several months into practicing at a barre, I had a eureka moment— doing it by myself took on an entirely new form of movement. I was able to practice my embellishments without relying on my partner, and in doing so “Tango at the barre” was born I’ve choreographed a three minute dance that represents what a caterpillar emerging out of its cocoon, and becoming a butterfly would look like-The path to enlightenment is never an easy one. This dance represents not only the caterpillar’s fight to evolve—but all of ours. Set to the whimsical music of Solo Tango Orchestra’s El Hurucan, this piece will represent the birth of Mariposita. Sunset Monday, Tuesday And Wednesday. I will also spend some time teaching anyone who would like to learn some of the movements after the dance.

Our staff is available to teach, demonstrate, and can help facilitate the proper use of all toys such as a variety of floggers (deer, elk, cow, rabbit, rubber band, and horse hair), paddles, crops, feathers, furry mitts, pinwheels and a violet wand. We specialize in Floggassage which is the combination of a full body massage using your hands and whole body, as well as, all the dungeon toys such as floggers, feathers, paddles, furry mitts, and more.

TV Liquid Brunch: Come on and feel euphoria with Carousel Zarya
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM ']
cum get wired!: Carousel Zarya is a rotating, interactive art installation and ride. It is hand-powered, driven by human energy, spits fire and smoke into the sky, combined together music and mechanics, arts, poetry, technology and Halloween spirit. Any citizen of Black Rock City, when tired of passive spectacle elsewhere, can come spin the Carousel and become its motor. The energy transmitted from the human motor overflows into the creativity and joy of the spinning people on the platform. They feel like actors on a stage. Everything is there for you! It's a rotating stage for musicians, steam punk pole for dancing girls, the best wooden animals for children, theatre lights, smoke and fire for actors. We will playing authentic cozy funk from 70s on unusual musical instrument— electro hurdy-gurdy AMbox. What is this? It is like a radio but more than a radio. This is the instrument, on which everybody can play own melody.The Carousel Zarya empowers and inspires creativity and collaboration, returning participants to the free-spirited days of childhood and fantasy.
