['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 7 AM – 9 AM ']
cum get wired!: Party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our Mighty Ship, the “USS Nevada”, and our infamous ARRGH Bar, open daily from 10:00am to 10:00pm…ish, where we’ll be serving up our special “Se(a)men” and other delicious grogs. Come join us for our 2019 “Theme Parties”. The start of our Party season officially begins on Monday with our “NAKED PIRATE SHOTS” party from Noon to 2pm. Tuesday from 10am to Noon we head down the rabbit hole for our “MAD PIRATE TEA PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, “BLACKBEARD’S BLACKBERRY BASH” serves up our own Blackberry grog. Wednesday from Noon to 2pm, join us for our “MAI TAI PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm we get to wear white with our “WHITE LINEN PARTY”. Thursday from 7am to 9am, stretch out with “MORNING NINYASA YOGA AND MIMOSA”, then from Noon to 2pm our bartender’s “booty” will be on display at our “BOOTY SHORTS PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm our lovely lasses will dazzle you at the “WICKED WENCHES PARTY”, and 4pm to 6pm, our “PIRATES AND MERMAIDS PARTY”. Friday from Noon to 2pm, join us for some “SUNKEN TREASURE TASTY TREATS, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “PIRATE COWBOY PARTY” shows that Pirates are just Cowboys with a different hat. Saturday from 7am to 9am start the day with “MORNING VINYASA YOGA AND SUNRISE SIPPERS”, and then from Noon to 2pm, embrace your inner Basque with our “PICON PUNCH PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “DRAG BALL FASHION SHOW” will surely inspire ALL Kings and Queens. Finally, on Sunday from 10am to Noon, we bring an end to the party with our amazing “BLOODY MARY PARTY”! Daily, we will have morning coffee, and throughout the week we will be hosting Burlesque lessons, Pole Dancing demonstrations, Flogging demonstrations, body painting and more! We also have an awesome “Chill space” with lots of couches and shade, a Wayward Wenches Bazaar, where you can pick up that much needed item, great music, and a rowdy crew of Wenches and Pirates that are always up for the best time possible as we “Belly up to the bar

cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lesson will shre-ucate your aspirating young skater. All skill levels welcome (Boys and Girls) (age 3-7 year old) for the little shredder program for first time skaters. Instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps holding hands. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created little shredder programs (3-7 years old) for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

cum get wired!: What is the scariest thing on earth, as reported by the human race? It's not spiders or dying - it's public speaking. What is improvisation? Public speaking without the safety net of knowing what the fuck you are going to say. So improv is - by textbook definition - the scariest thing on earth...which is why it makes such an amazing tool for growth. Worldwide teacher and improviser Philip Markle will lead attendees toward making Fear your friend and the experience of the unknown something to lean into and use as as fuel to create in all aspects of your life. This is a participatory workshop - though the goal isn't improv comedy so much as improvisation for life - and it's also cool to just come observe and ask questions.

cum get wired!: Have you noticed that the more you try to control the people and events in your life, the less in control you feel? But when you relax the tightness of your grip, and pay attention to what is actually happening (instead of what you think should be happening), then you are fully available to respond creatively and appropriately in each moment. Dr Susan Campbell If any of this feels real for you, join us as we scratch the surface of Dr. Campbell's work, exploring the fear stories and control patterns that prevent authenticity and vulnerability! In various containers, we will uncover our fear stories and play with the ways we use control patterns unconsciously or compulsively to help us avoid feeling out of control, foolish, rejected, criticized, abandoned (or any other fear outcome). In becoming more aware of these patterns, we can shift from a security/control mindset to a learning/discovery mindset that allows us to be more present and authentic to the moment. Located at Dome 3.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 PM ']
cum get wired!: “Scientists vs. Kafka” is one fifth RPG, half board game, two sevenths puzzle solving, and some random percentage of scavenger hunt! And hopefully your team will be better at math than that, as you play the roles of scientists, defending Black Rock City against the imprecise scourge of philosophy! Or possibly bugs. But secretly, you aim to dominate the city yourself and spread your “Manicfesto” as you assemble the Ultimate Weapon, a 3D “device” assembled from pieces scattered at participating camps across the city. You’ll solve puzzles, go on wacky quests, play immersive games, and precipitate your ambitions. Every successful accomplishment gains you a degree along the Tenure Track, from undergraduate to Emeritus, and ownership of a block on the big board of Black Rock, a lasercut map of our favorite dusty city. Who will spread their Manicfesto block by block from Esplanade to the airport? The maddest scientists with the strongest duct tape, of course! A Mentor will run the game in camp from noon to 3pm every day to assign quests, confirm successful completions, bestow degrees, and spread each team’s Manicfesto onto the BRC map. Teams (or individuals) can pursue quests throughout the city all day and night, however! Participants get to keep their assembled “device” (or the pieces if they get too distracted to finish) and degrees as permanent mementos of how close they came to world domination. And a drink to lament the same.

cum get wired!: Again this year, YOUniversal will offer a Persian Tea House - designed by Gregg Fleishman (Temple 2013). For 8 hours each day (noon ‘til 8pm) we will offer desert-friendly drinks, hot and cold, along with exotic sweets and sour treats, and some parlor games and poetry / fortune telling all based on the Persian culture. PRO TIP: In addition to our daily Teahouse, come by WEDNESDAY NIGHT, when we host an open Persian dinner! We keep serving amazing hot Persian Food, fluffy saffron infused rice with tadeeg, until we are out of food!! Don't miss this truly amazing opportunity to eat yummy Persian food on the playa!! Since our camp consists of mostly veteran burners of Persian descent, we are really good at two things that can be helpful on the playa, hospitality and fun desert dwelling wisdom. We plan on showcasing both for our fellow burners. As such the YOUniversal Persian Tea House will include a daily variety of ancient Persian favorites, time tested to do well in a desert setting: Drinks & Liquids Persian Tea (optionally with Cardamom) Sekanjebin - Honey / Vinegar + Mint drink served with lettuce dip Sharbeteh Albaloo - Sour Elderberry Sherbet Sharbateh Behleemoo - Quince Lime Sherbet Dough - Yogurt Drink Ab-du-khiar - Cold Yogurt, Cucumber, Herbs, Walnuts and Raisins Soup Sweets & Treats Sohan - Persian Saffron Brittle Noon Nokhod-chee - Chick Pea treats Gaz - Nougat like taffy with pistachos embedded Baghlava - Persian Baklava Zulbia / Bamieh - Sugar-Syrupy Dough Sohan Asali - Persian Almond Brittle Shirini e Zaban - Persian Puff Pastry Ranginak - Date and Walnut squares Lavashak - Sweet or Sour Fruit roll-ups of various kinds Poetry and Parlor Games Takhteh Nard - Backgammon Shat-ranj - Chess Hokm - Persian Card Game Hafez Poetry - Fortune Telling Rumi Poetry Readings

cum get wired!: You know what the playa doesn't have? A cat cafe. You know, those cafes where adoptable cats charm, delight, and annoy you while you are sipping a cold beverage? Well, earth cats may find the playa inhospitable, but SPACEcats are very well adapted to its harsh terrain. After the metamorphosis from Human to Space Cat in our SPACE CAT SOUNDBATH (11:30am), our new feline friends are invited to take part in our Space Cat Cafe with us. You know, flick their tails around and arch their backs, get used to their new physical forms. Thai iced tea and treats will be served to humans and spacecats alike. Cat toys will be available to distract us. Speaking of which, are you not into interstellar felines? Scared of Aliens? Allergic to cats (or humans who wear cat costumes?) No problem! Skip the Human to Space Cat conversion process and join us for Thai Iced Tea and treats in the space ship and in our public shaded cafe. Maybe you'll come for a drink and end up adopting a spacecat. It's the playa, who knows?!?!?!?! If you're lucky, you'll be at our cafe when Mac and Joon are on-site with their INFORMATION/INTUITION BOOTH. Have a question? Participants who approach the booth will be given the choice between Information from Mac who will be present with books and a myriad of facts OR they can select Joon to intuit an answer. She will meditate and offer them a response. Answers may not be available at this time, answers may be too personal to get a clear read, or answers may come spontaneously. Participants will be advised well and approached with both humor and depth. Mac and Joon intend to bring a balance between Science and the Mystical.

TV Liquid Brunch: Camp ShotSki Bar and Snow Bunny Selfie Station
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: The bar is open! Park your bike in our plentiful Ski adorned Bike Racks (leave your skis there too), and belly up front and center to the ShotSki Bar for a shot of ice cold FireBall (the perfect Burner Libation) from one of our fantastic friend-making official SHOTSKIs. It's a wonderful combination of spicy fire and cool refreshment. Have 1 friend? We have a 2 person shotski! Have 2 friends? We have a 3 person shotski! Have 3 fiends? We have a 4 person shotski! Have 3 friends and want to meet 3 more- perhaps some cute sparkleponies? We have a 6 person shotski! Have 11 friends? We even have a TWELVE PERSON SHOTSKI! Have no friends but want to make friends? Our camp of veterans and newbies will join you and entice other burners to be part of the action while we bring a bit of this traditional Sierra fun to the Playa. You don't want to miss the Avalanche when ALL 5 Shotskis (yes I said all 5 shotskis) are raised at the one time! You've heard the stories and they are all true - but bring your ID because we want to keep the Ski Patrol happy, and the slopes safe. While visiting, don’t miss out Shotski Snow Bunny Photo Booth perfect to take pics and selfies in to remember your great time at our camp! We have all the accessories to make your photo on the Playa memorable, complete w/ Skis, Boots, Poles, Bunny Ears and more! Try your balance on our Playa Skis, or just look cute in our various sets of bunny ears. Includes a great backdrop for your pics. We've got lots of shade in the Chalet Lounge to protect you from that midday sun glaring off the snowpack- not to mention provide shelter from the wind and dust if a storm brews. Our gigantic king bed crowned with a Ski Headboard in the chalet loft is the best place to relax after a day of avoiding moguls in deep playa. Grab a board game or just a chair. Like all alpine getaways, it's the time spent relaxing and laughing with friends that can be the most memorable.

cum get wired!: Revelation! Revolution! Liberation! These are the metamorphoses that you will gift to the Playa when you suit up and join the ranks of the French Maid Brigade. As catalysts for change, we use our power to transform Burning Man. The bedazzling glory of Black Rock City lies hidden and distorted as the true potential of Burning Man incubates under a chrysalis of dust. Only the French Maid Brigade with their exquisite attention to vague details and filth can reveal the full radicalness of expression poised to bless the citizens of Black Rock City. Rendezvous with us! You too can become one of the sexiest clean freaks on the Playa—please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. Join us in uniform with your surly attitude and worst possible French accent. On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph! Burning Man will never be the same again! Long live Burning Man!

Primarily focused on implicit communication, building trust, safety, and flowing with dramatic experiences from dark and emotional to silly and playful. Partner required! Radically inclusive of all spanking styles, and butt shapes. All experience levels encouraged to join. The only place on the Playa where Leaving No Trace (on your partner) is optional!

cum get wired!: As we began exploring our shadows and depths, we often found ourselves steeped in shame and judgment, leaving the work feeling dark and heavy. In our desire to lean into the discomfort and in fact change our perspective on the perceived heaviness, we came across these *Surprise!* quotes about shame by Brene Brown: Because true belonging only happens when we present our authentic, imperfect selves to the world, our sense of belonging can never be greater than our level of self acceptance. If we can share our story with someone who responds with empathy and understanding, shame can't survive. Numb the dark and you numb the light. We decided to change the story and shine light on our shame by talking about it openly, and finding ways to laugh about it and bring levity to what was previously weighing us down. Join us as we create a soft, loving, and playful environment to share with radical self acceptance all the ways our inner critic tries to bring us down.

TV Liquid Brunch: Revolution of hippies in USSR - talk&discussion
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 3 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: Yes, there were hippies in Soviet Union! Come and hear about the incredible history of this longlasting underground movement of peace, love, freedom & creativity. Driven by the years-long anthropological research and visual documentation, this talk & discussion takes you on a Sovietic time machine, pulling you right into the psychedelic underground of the Soviet hippies. Through the 1970s, a subcultural network often referred to as sistema (translates from Russian as the system) expanded across the urban Soviet Union, connecting likeminded people with a wayfaring lifestyle. Between one other, information about gathering places and music festivals was shared, as well as the addresses and phone numbers of other people who associated themselves with sistema. The emerging social network made it possible to travel to another city and immediately find social support and a place to stay. As the hippies often say: “They had their system, we had our own system.” What was their protest like? How did they access Western rock and got to play their own music? What got them high? How did the Soviet hippies look like? Who was their guru? Didn't the KGB beat them up? And ultimately, what are the lessons of the pacifist history of ex-Soviet region we may take on board now? Join this imaginary time travel at CAMP SIIL @ Børningländ Village @ 3:30 & Echo

Come join us for our 2019 “Theme Parties”. The start of our Party season officially begins on Monday with our “NAKED PIRATE SHOTS” party from Noon to 2pm. Tuesday from 10am to Noon we head down the rabbit hole for our “MAD PIRATE TEA PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, “BLACKBEARD’S BLACKBERRY BASH” serves up our own Blackberry grog. Wednesday from Noon to 2pm, join us for our “MAI TAI PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm we get to wear white with our “WHITE LINEN PARTY”. Thursday from 7am to 9am, stretch out with “MORNING NINYASA YOGA AND MIMOSA”, then from Noon to 2pm our bartender’s “booty” will be on display at our “BOOTY SHORTS PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm our lovely lasses will dazzle you at the “WICKED WENCHES PARTY”, and 4pm to 6pm, our “PIRATES AND MERMAIDS PARTY”. ['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7 PM ']
cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lessons will shred-ucate you. All skill levels welcome. Sk8 gear provided: Sk8boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Come learn to sk8 on the Playa! For first time skaters instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created programs for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: Experience tools and practices to practice wild intimacy with all things. The soul came here for full participation. Wild Intimacy: Illuminate your understanding and provide foundational tools that merge the physical and energy body within the universe of you(self) to enhance all relationships. During the workshop, we use breath, movement, visualization, sound, and community practices to wake up the body. Using a mixture of solo, partner, and group exercises, including witnessing, mirroring and self-inquiry. Engage in Authentic Relating and Games, tantric practices, shamanic tools for more connection and intimacy Let face it, we are wired for a time that doesn’t exist…and build up our own artificial reality and mental constructs that are well….are less than intuitive or magical. We have deadened our own existence. This direct experience workshop is a facilitated experience to build capacity for WILD INTIMACY with all things... to WAKE UP and see the atoms inside of you as part of a higher order. Utilizing the I, We, It...to cultivate spaciousness. In the practice of spacious we become both empty and whole. Life become rich. Juicy. Walk away from this experience...and life itself becomes your lover. Facilitated by Danielle Petersen, Wild Soul Living. Be Wild. Be You. Be Free.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 7:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: LEARN HOW TO: -dance confidently with anyone -connect more deeply to your authentic expression -convey emotions through movement -express your desires confidently and eloquently -embody your full YES letting go of guilt or shame -convey clear and healthy boundaries energetically and physically -get out of your head and into your body -differentiate between sexuality, love, sensuality, and intimacy -connect physically in a mindful, nurturing, and artistic way -receive healing touch and affection from others -become fluent in Body Language -unlock your unique version of artistic expression -move beyond self consciousness to self awareness -sense vibration and subtle energy fields -become aware of your patterned movements and outdated methods of interaction -reclaim your sovereign right to sensuality -feel a sense of unity through transpersonal awareness -experience the joy of pure embodiment (state of no-mind) -bring play back into your life ************************************************************ The EXTATIK KONTAKT goes beyond Contact Improv, Modern Dance, and Ecstatic Dance by focusing on human connection and our own personal development to bring awareness of the True Self and deeper connections to others. This event happens weekly around the globe and is a powerful and transformative journey connecting you to your unique expression that is the authentic self, while forging deeper relationships to others through harmonized movement. Embark on your conscious evolution through dance and expand your personal power by aligning with the energetics that create your expression of art through movement. Together, we move away from self conscious suffering towards a clarity through a moving meditation. The expert guidance and safety created in our container during the Tuesday EXTATIK KONTAKT allows us to individually and collectively break through boundaries to support one another in the exploration of the self.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM <--> Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: Giant Ball Sumo Wrestling: 30 minutes of matches beginning at 4:30 pm Giant Ball Couples Counseling at 5:00 pm each day. Main Event: Running of the Balls. Two running games beginning at 5:30 pm All events feature gifts of red bandannas and chilled sangria. Giant Ball Sumo can happen at any time, and often does. Either within our wooden corral or out on the street, two participants square off in a circle, each wearing a giant inflatable ball. Matches usually last only a minute, as the balls get knocked over and roll out of the ring. A taiko drummer provides drama, and there's always one or two ball wranglers on hand to help participants in and out. Couples Counseling, in which two people wearing giant balls (could be more if they're from Poly Paradise!!) try to knock some sense into their partner, with some very non-PC advice being shouted at them by our trained counselors from a bullhorn. Running of the Balls: Each day's activities end with two running games, during which six angry balls are released from our corral into a crowd of red-bandanna-wearing runners. Course flag waivers are positioned around the nearby plaza, and the runners must complete the course and try to survive by not getting knocked down.

cum get wired!: Pointlessly bureaucratic playa name change service bureau (PBPNCS Bureau): We all know someone with a playa name they wish they didn’t have, now they have an “official” way to apply to change it! Hours will be.... who the fuck knows! (actually we will be serving food during the official hours -cheesey ooey gooey goodness) Applicants must take a number and ring a bell to alert us of their presence. Consented ass paddling will be offered to those waiting. Because let’s make waiting in line more painful, if only all lines came with a good spanking. They may or may not be served in a reasonable amount of time. Once served, applicants must submit to an interview about their former name and desired playa name and fill out a very tedious form. Name change officers are trained to help pull the playa name from the applicant! You may have to perform a task to get your name changed. We will see how the bureaucrats feel. cum get wired!: Turn your world upside down at this all levels acroyoga class ~ all levels welcome, no partner needed, The AcroYoga practice combines the grace of yoga with the excitement of acrobatics and the joy of working in community. It challenges the fundamental concept that our feet need to be on the ground. Come and defy gravity! ~ We will employ safe, simple steps to learn physical techniques to fly and give flight to others! In the process, we will cultivate trust, strength, empowerment and playfulness. By embodying the roles of base, flyer, and spotter, we will develop communication and trust, while finding stability, flexibility, and freedom in flying yoga poses. Expect to laugh, meet new people and surprise yourself with what you can do! This workshop is for all levels of experience, whether you've never tried acroyoga before or you are a seasoned practitioner. Come alone or bring all your friends!

cum get wired!: Awaken creativity & revelation. Unleash your spirit. Freely & authentically express yourself. Nourished by the energy of dance, cultivate a deep relationship with your body and with others. Our own body intelligence gives way to intuitive healing, awakening, and emotional release through movement. WHAT IS ECSTATIC DANCE // Ecstatic dance is a form of dance meditation in which the dancers abandon themselves to the rhythm and move freely as the music takes them, leading to trance and a feeling of ecstasy. There are no rules and no structure to the dance. Similar to a festival. Located at the Pinwheel.

cum get wired!: Drop off writings & 2d art for a book on what the feminine means to you. Will be added to book in art piece and later in print. All genders needed. The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 6:30 PM – 10 PM ']
cum get wired!: Welcome to the first ever Couch Burners Trashfence Eleganza Runway Show! Clearly we all take Radical Self Expression very seriously at Burning Man. What better way to celebrate our unique selves than a little flaunty fashion show?! We’re opening the stage for YOU to come and express yourself in any way your dusty little heart desires. Have you ever wanted to sashay down the street in a chewbacka suit with a chasity belt on? Maybe while licking a delicious ice cream cone?? Yea, we’ve been there too. Wouldn’t be caught dead in that crotchless corset at the Trash-fence?? We still encourage you to bring it! Whatever you’re into sharing, were into seeing. Fantasy, fetish, raunch, trash, leather, fur, lace..literally anything but sparkles and feathers goes. Don’t have enough sauce?? Not to worry, we’ll have tons of thrift shop stock for you to choose from. All items will be gifted at a reasonably priced free.99 Join us early for cocktails at our BRC famous bar at 6:30pm. Get styled by some of our sluttiest professionals, or get hyped in our crowd preparing to cheer on the models! The show will commence at 7:30pm sharp as our saucy models begin to grace the runway. Model and bottle service will follow with a dance off at our bar. See you on the runway!

cum get wired!: The Queen Dick is hosting a unique and special evening with DJ Gus Emmett from 7pm to midnight, followed by a deep playa star gazing excursion lead by The Queen Dick’s very own NASA astronomer Boris. London favorite, Gus Emmett (Warm Up) brings his eclectic melodic techno and house vibe to the playa, tailoring each track, and each and every minute of music, to the energy, the crowd and his surroundings. As the desert heat dies down, we’ll dance in tandem with the earth and galaxy gods, and celebrate our woodland earth and diamond encrusted universe with wonder. Following this, NASA astronomer Boris L will take us down to the darkest depths of deep playa to answer Q&A about astrophysics, have actual observations through binoculars, and will cover the formation of planets, stars, our solar system, our galaxy, and the universe.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Monday, August 26th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 7 PM – 7 AM ']
cum get wired!: Tiny Dirty Secret is the third installment of a trifecta of art pieces. Little Dirty Secret in 2017 and Big Dirty Secret in 2018. Everyone has a secret, some dirty, some sad, some funny, and some bad. Secrets are held within are never usually shared with a single soul. Tiny Dirty Secret is a place to quietly and anonymously let go of your secrets 24hrs a day. Those can range from confessions, fears, sexual fantasies, betrayals, crimes, desires, humiliations, abuse, or anything you need to let go of. All cards are kept locked and safe from others so there is no fear of retaliation or negative reactions. We uphold the security and trust and guarantee your secret is Safe at Tiny Dirty Secret. Stay Anonymous, no names or personal info. If you have an emergency or need help, find the nearest ranger. If you would like to talk to someone and make a new friend, we'd be delighted. If so, leave any contact info that you feel comfortable with. Have Fun, Be Safe!

Our staff is available to teach, demonstrate, and can help facilitate the proper use of all toys such as a variety of floggers (deer, elk, cow, rabbit, rubber band, and horse hair), paddles, crops, feathers, furry mitts, pinwheels and a violet wand. TV Liquid Brunch: Come on and feel euphoria with Carousel Zarya
['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM <--> Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 10:30 PM – 1:30 AM ']
cum get wired!: Carousel Zarya is a rotating, interactive art installation and ride. It is hand-powered, driven by human energy, spits fire and smoke into the sky, combined together music and mechanics, arts, poetry, technology and Halloween spirit. Any citizen of Black Rock City, when tired of passive spectacle elsewhere, can come spin the Carousel and become its motor. The energy transmitted from the human motor overflows into the creativity and joy of the spinning people on the platform. They feel like actors on a stage. Everything is there for you! It's a rotating stage for musicians, steam punk pole for dancing girls, the best wooden animals for children, theatre lights, smoke and fire for actors. We will playing authentic cozy funk from 70s on unusual musical instrument— electro hurdy-gurdy AMbox. What is this? It is like a radio but more than a radio. This is the instrument, on which everybody can play own melody.The Carousel Zarya empowers and inspires creativity and collaboration, returning participants to the free-spirited days of childhood and fantasy.

cum get wired!: This is a highly participatory workshop where women will make and decorate their own sexy Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the playa. Recyclable aluminum is used to hand hammer a custom fit costume using traditional hand metal working techniques handed down by cultures across the ages. Helpers will be available assist as needed, but past camps have shown that participants were all highly successful and delighted with their costumes and new skills. We will have a “dungeon” façade and props set up in the camp, along with our Giant Green Dragon mutant vehicle for a backdrop for the girls to shoot photos of their completed creations. Prop swords, axes and throne furnished for effect. Also new this year will be a body painting station for painting of “tribal tattoos” and theme- based decorative art for participants and accompanying friends. Think Dragons! A special bonus is our Must be Naked to Ride Life-Size Animatronic Dinosaur. Don't miss it. Workshop will be open daily 8am-noon. Construction takes about 2 hours. All materials gifted of course.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 9 AM – 10:30 AM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 9 AM – 10:30 AM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 9 AM – 10:30 AM ']
cum get wired!: Our Sk8 lessons will shred-ucate you. All skill levels welcome. Sk8 gear provided: Sk8boards, helmets, pads and shoes. Come learn to Sk8 on the Playa! For first time skaters instructors will teach proper standing, pushing, stopping, turning, and in some cases going down small ramps. We will have a blue wave runner sk8 tunnel for practicing your skating and surfing. Sk8 Director James Pike has been teaching surfing and skating for 20 years in California, Oregon, Hawaii and Mexico. He’s has run and created programs for skate camps in Santa Barbara, California with parks and recreation and Scotts Valley, California with parks and recreation. Pike’s attention to detail combined with his love for sharing knowledge about skating making this the very best place to learn how to skate on the Playa. All instructors are trained and certified by Pike to teach up to his standards and most importantly safety, saftey, safety. Skateboarding is also very emotionally therapeutic and a great way to work out things with yourself. Pike’s sk8 philosophy plays a huge role in learning to trust yourself and looking at the bigger picture. Sk8 yoga is also a huge part of lessons and we will do some stretching in the beginning and afterwords to keep ourselves properly skateboarding to the best of our abilities. When showing up to skate camp please sign in at the Sk8 kiosk with the surfboard that says “Sk8Watch” to check in. Look for skaters with t-shirts that say “Sk8Watch”.

cum get wired!: In 1985 a book called The Ancient Secret of the Fountain of Youth written by Peter Kelder was published which for the first time fully described an exercise program for youthing. This is an exercise program used by Tibetan monks to live long, vibrant and healthy lives. In fact, this book states that many have lived longer than most can imagine by following the program often called the Five Tibetan Rites. The Tibetans claim that these exercises activate and stimulate the seven key chakras that in turn stimulate all the glands of the endocrine system. The endocrine system is responsible for the body's overall functioning and aging process. This means that the Five Rites will affect the functioning of all your organs and systems, including the physical and energetic systems and that includes the aging process. The man who brought these Five Rights out of Tibet stated that performing the Five Rites stimulates the circulation of essential life energy throughout the body.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Friday, August 30th, 2019, 10 AM – 12 PM ']
cum get wired!: The Divine Masculine and the Divine Feminine are loaded terms these days as we clarify and refine what they mean for us in this post #metoo movement era clearly headed in a less binary and more gender-fluid trajectory. How do we relate to each other as men, women and everything in between? How do we relate with our sensuality, sexuality and desire? What is intimacy and how do we get there? How do we begin healing the deep wounds we carry around gender and sexuality from our own lifetime as well as those we inherited from our ancestors? In this workshop with Alexis Ware, L.Ac., ThetaHealing® expert, we will explore these themes as a group, in partner exercises and define, rework and clarify in a live ThetaHealing as we shift together from our wounding to collaboration and creation in a safe container.

cum get wired!: What’s more radically self reliant than being able to make your own incredibly unique and oh-so functional playa clothing using all basic, ethical and natural materials, come into our shade and learn an ancient and unique skill. The most ancient of textiles is a marvelous material that can be shaped, moulded and sculpted, repels water and dirt and for these reasons it has a long history of being used for clothing, headwear and footwear. It makes PERFECT playa clothing, is ethical and sustainable! Full outfits can be made with the most simple materials - soap, water, towels, bubble wrap and some wool roving (wool before it's made into yarn) come by and learn the process of making wool into anything you can dream, without the need to sew a single stitch. You will be shown the basic techniques and examples of what can be made, and then have a chance to make your very own wet felt bracelet, a playa momento made from ethical and natural materials and your own hands. Bonus Playa Points – this is the technique used to make wool dreadlocks! Materials provided and space limited

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 12 PM – 6 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 12 PM – 6 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12 PM – 6 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 12 PM – 6 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 12 PM – 6 PM <--> Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 12 PM – 6 PM ']
cum get wired!: Again this year, YOUniversal will offer a Persian Tea House - designed by Gregg Fleishman (Temple 2013). For 8 hours each day (noon ‘til 8pm) we will offer desert-friendly drinks, hot and cold, along with exotic sweets and sour treats, and some parlor games and poetry / fortune telling all based on the Persian culture. PRO TIP: In addition to our daily Teahouse, come by WEDNESDAY NIGHT, when we host an open Persian dinner! We keep serving amazing hot Persian Food, fluffy saffron infused rice with tadeeg, until we are out of food!! Don't miss this truly amazing opportunity to eat yummy Persian food on the playa!! Since our camp consists of mostly veteran burners of Persian descent, we are really good at two things that can be helpful on the playa, hospitality and fun desert dwelling wisdom. We plan on showcasing both for our fellow burners. As such the YOUniversal Persian Tea House will include a daily variety of ancient Persian favorites, time tested to do well in a desert setting: Drinks & Liquids Persian Tea (optionally with Cardamom) Sekanjebin - Honey / Vinegar + Mint drink served with lettuce dip Sharbeteh Albaloo - Sour Elderberry Sherbet Sharbateh Behleemoo - Quince Lime Sherbet Dough - Yogurt Drink Ab-du-khiar - Cold Yogurt, Cucumber, Herbs, Walnuts and Raisins Soup Sweets & Treats Sohan - Persian Saffron Brittle Noon Nokhod-chee - Chick Pea treats Gaz - Nougat like taffy with pistachos embedded Baghlava - Persian Baklava Zulbia / Bamieh - Sugar-Syrupy Dough Sohan Asali - Persian Almond Brittle Shirini e Zaban - Persian Puff Pastry Ranginak - Date and Walnut squares Lavashak - Sweet or Sour Fruit roll-ups of various kinds Poetry and Parlor Games Takhteh Nard - Backgammon Shat-ranj - Chess Hokm - Persian Card Game Hafez Poetry - Fortune Telling Rumi Poetry Readings

cum get wired!: “Scientists vs. Kafka” is one fifth RPG, half board game, two sevenths puzzle solving, and some random percentage of scavenger hunt! And hopefully your team will be better at math than that, as you play the roles of scientists, defending Black Rock City against the imprecise scourge of philosophy! Or possibly bugs. But secretly, you aim to dominate the city yourself and spread your “Manicfesto” as you assemble the Ultimate Weapon, a 3D “device” assembled from pieces scattered at participating camps across the city. You’ll solve puzzles, go on wacky quests, play immersive games, and precipitate your ambitions. Every successful accomplishment gains you a degree along the Tenure Track, from undergraduate to Emeritus, and ownership of a block on the big board of Black Rock, a lasercut map of our favorite dusty city. Who will spread their Manicfesto block by block from Esplanade to the airport? The maddest scientists with the strongest duct tape, of course! A Mentor will run the game in camp from noon to 3pm every day to assign quests, confirm successful completions, bestow degrees, and spread each team’s Manicfesto onto the BRC map. Teams (or individuals) can pursue quests throughout the city all day and night, however! Participants get to keep their assembled “device” (or the pieces if they get too distracted to finish) and degrees as permanent mementos of how close they came to world domination. And a drink to lament the same.

TV Liquid Brunch: Black Rock City Summit Photo Opp

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 12:30 PM – 2:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: You know what the playa doesn't have? A cat cafe. You know, those cafes where adoptable cats charm, delight, and annoy you while you are sipping a cold beverage? Well, earth cats may find the playa inhospitable, but SPACEcats are very well adapted to its harsh terrain. After the metamorphosis from Human to Space Cat in our SPACE CAT SOUNDBATH (11:30am), our new feline friends are invited to take part in our Space Cat Cafe with us. You know, flick their tails around and arch their backs, get used to their new physical forms. Thai iced tea and treats will be served to humans and spacecats alike. Cat toys will be available to distract us. Speaking of which, are you not into interstellar felines? Scared of Aliens? Allergic to cats (or humans who wear cat costumes?) No problem! Skip the Human to Space Cat conversion process and join us for Thai Iced Tea and treats in the space ship and in our public shaded cafe. Maybe you'll come for a drink and end up adopting a spacecat. It's the playa, who knows?!?!?!?! If you're lucky, you'll be at our cafe when Mac and Joon are on-site with their INFORMATION/INTUITION BOOTH. Have a question? Participants who approach the booth will be given the choice between Information from Mac who will be present with books and a myriad of facts OR they can select Joon to intuit an answer. She will meditate and offer them a response. Answers may not be available at this time, answers may be too personal to get a clear read, or answers may come spontaneously. Participants will be advised well and approached with both humor and depth. Mac and Joon intend to bring a balance between Science and the Mystical.

cum get wired!: The Director of ElephantsNow.org will provide an overview of Asian Elephants and their plight, with stories and solutions. Philip Price is founder of ElephantsNow.org, and the I Love Elephants theme camp at Burning Man. Sixteen years a Burner, he believes the magic pill to save species will be found within the matrix of creative minds that attend this event. He has more than 20 years of activism toward saving Asian elephants. He is on the front lines - using documentary filmmaking, social media and consciousness raising as his primary tools. Fostering orphaned elephants and providing essential equipment to the front lines veterinarians and rangers in Asia is a major part of his organizations efforts.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Friday, August 30th, 2019, 1 PM – 2:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: Cory Doctorow Surveillance Capitalism is Monopoly Capitalism New Zealand's privacy commissioner calls Big Tech morally bankrupt liars. He's right. Everything that Big Tech claims about itself should be treated with suspicion -- including (especially) the marketing materials in which they claim that they can use surveillance to override our free will and convince us of any idea advertisers are willing to pay to spread. Big Tech *does* control our choices: by holding our friends hostage in their walled gardens, by using software locks to prevent us from choosing whose software we run or where we get our gadgets fixed, and by controlling the discourse by dominating search and recommendation. We can choose to fix Big Tech -- by subjecting them to the kinds of expensive regulations that only the biggest companies can afford -- or we can choose to fix the internet -- by breaking up Big Tech into manageable pieces, which will not be able to afford to police their users for terrorism, harassment, extremism, copyright infringement, etc. But we can't do both. Better to have a free, fair and open internet than to drape golden chains around Big Tech and hope that they never outgrow them.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Monday, August 26th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Tuesday, August 27th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Wednesday, August 28th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Thursday, August 29th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM <--> Friday, August 30th, 2019, 1 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: The bar is open! Park your bike in our plentiful Ski adorned Bike Racks (leave your skis there too), and belly up front and center to the ShotSki Bar for a shot of ice cold FireBall (the perfect Burner Libation) from one of our fantastic friend-making official SHOTSKIs. It's a wonderful combination of spicy fire and cool refreshment. Have 1 friend? We have a 2 person shotski! Have 2 friends? We have a 3 person shotski! Have 3 fiends? We have a 4 person shotski! Have 3 friends and want to meet 3 more- perhaps some cute sparkleponies? We have a 6 person shotski! Have 11 friends? We even have a TWELVE PERSON SHOTSKI! Have no friends but want to make friends? Our camp of veterans and newbies will join you and entice other burners to be part of the action while we bring a bit of this traditional Sierra fun to the Playa. You don't want to miss the Avalanche when ALL 5 Shotskis (yes I said all 5 shotskis) are raised at the one time! You've heard the stories and they are all true - but bring your ID because we want to keep the Ski Patrol happy, and the slopes safe. While visiting, don’t miss out Shotski Snow Bunny Photo Booth perfect to take pics and selfies in to remember your great time at our camp! We have all the accessories to make your photo on the Playa memorable, complete w/ Skis, Boots, Poles, Bunny Ears and more! Try your balance on our Playa Skis, or just look cute in our various sets of bunny ears. Includes a great backdrop for your pics. We've got lots of shade in the Chalet Lounge to protect you from that midday sun glaring off the snowpack- not to mention provide shelter from the wind and dust if a storm brews. Our gigantic king bed crowned with a Ski Headboard in the chalet loft is the best place to relax after a day of avoiding moguls in deep playa. Grab a board game or just a chair. Like all alpine getaways, it's the time spent relaxing and laughing with friends that can be the most memorable.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Friday, August 30th, 2019, 2 PM – 4 PM ']
cum get wired!: Join Jocelyn Ketsdever from LumiDance to create your own unique Dreamcatcher! Jocelyn will provide all of the materials with lots of choices to make it unique! These dreamcatchers are based on the essence of the traditional Native American talismans. Sometimes referred to as Sacred Hoops, Ogibwe dream catchers were traditionally used as talismans to protect sleeping people, usually children, from bad dreams and nightmares. Native Americans believe that the night air is filled with dreams, both good and bad. When hung above the bed in a place where the morning sunlight can hit it, the dream catcher attracts all sorts of dreams and thoughts into its webs. Good dreams pass through and gently slide down the feathers to the sleeper below while bad dreams are caught in its protective net and destroyed, burned up in the light of day. No experience necessary! You'll leave with your own creation & inspiration to create more.

cum get wired!: Giant Ball Sumo Wrestling: 30 minutes of matches beginning at 4:30 pm Giant Ball Couples Counseling at 5:00 pm each day. Main Event: Running of the Balls. Two running games beginning at 5:30 pm All events feature gifts of red bandannas and chilled sangria. Giant Ball Sumo can happen at any time, and often does. Either within our wooden corral or out on the street, two participants square off in a circle, each wearing a giant inflatable ball. Matches usually last only a minute, as the balls get knocked over and roll out of the ring. A taiko drummer provides drama, and there's always one or two ball wranglers on hand to help participants in and out. Couples Counseling, in which two people wearing giant balls (could be more if they're from Poly Paradise!!) try to knock some sense into their partner, with some very non-PC advice being shouted at them by our trained counselors from a bullhorn. Running of the Balls: Each day's activities end with two running games, during which six angry balls are released from our corral into a crowd of red-bandanna-wearing runners. Course flag waivers are positioned around the nearby plaza, and the runners must complete the course and try to survive by not getting knocked down.

cum get wired!: Pointlessly bureaucratic playa name change service bureau (PBPNCS Bureau): We all know someone with a playa name they wish they didn’t have, now they have an “official” way to apply to change it! Hours will be.... who the fuck knows! (actually we will be serving food during the official hours -cheesey ooey gooey goodness) Applicants must take a number and ring a bell to alert us of their presence. Consented ass paddling will be offered to those waiting. Because let’s make waiting in line more painful, if only all lines came with a good spanking. They may or may not be served in a reasonable amount of time. Once served, applicants must submit to an interview about their former name and desired playa name and fill out a very tedious form. Name change officers are trained to help pull the playa name from the applicant! You may have to perform a task to get your name changed. We will see how the bureaucrats feel. A response letter as a souvenir, and as proof to your camp mates about what you can be called, will be delivered within a very reasonable 3-6 months post burn to their default world address (email or snail mail - again - up to the crats).

cum get wired!: What is The 360 Emergence? We are artists in service to the emergence of each person who shows up in our laboratories. We curate journeys and containers that weave the ever changing human into becoming leader-full and in-sight full. To becoming accountable and fluid. To see from every perspective. We awaken our 10,000 eyes and we ask you to do the same. We are heart activists. The body is our divining rod, music our ally, silence our guide. We seek balance between an inside education that beckons us into an alliance with the outside world. We are steeped in dance, ceremony, literature, fashion, theater, strength, humor, vulnerability and power.

cum get wired!: Drop off writings & 2d art for a book on what the feminine means to you. Will be added to book in art piece and later in print. All genders needed. The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.

cum get wired!: Tiny Dirty Secret is the third installment of a trifecta of art pieces. Little Dirty Secret in 2017 and Big Dirty Secret in 2018. Everyone has a secret, some dirty, some sad, some funny, and some bad. Secrets are held within are never usually shared with a single soul. Tiny Dirty Secret is a place to quietly and anonymously let go of your secrets 24hrs a day. Those can range from confessions, fears, sexual fantasies, betrayals, crimes, desires, humiliations, abuse, or anything you need to let go of. All cards are kept locked and safe from others so there is no fear of retaliation or negative reactions. We uphold the security and trust and guarantee your secret is Safe at Tiny Dirty Secret. Stay Anonymous, no names or personal info. If you have an emergency or need help, find the nearest ranger. If you would like to talk to someone and make a new friend, we'd be delighted. If so, leave any contact info that you feel comfortable with. Have Fun, Be Safe!

cum get wired!: Carousel Zarya is a rotating, interactive art installation and ride. It is hand-powered, driven by human energy, spits fire and smoke into the sky, combined together music and mechanics, arts, poetry, technology and Halloween spirit. Any citizen of Black Rock City, when tired of passive spectacle elsewhere, can come spin the Carousel and become its motor. The energy transmitted from the human motor overflows into the creativity and joy of the spinning people on the platform. They feel like actors on a stage. Everything is there for you! It's a rotating stage for musicians, steam punk pole for dancing girls, the best wooden animals for children, theatre lights, smoke and fire for actors. We will playing authentic cozy funk from 70s on unusual musical instrument— electro hurdy-gurdy AMbox. What is this? It is like a radio but more than a radio. This is the instrument, on which everybody can play own melody.The Carousel Zarya empowers and inspires creativity and collaboration, returning participants to the free-spirited days of childhood and fantasy.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Friday, August 30th, 2019, 11:45 PM – 1:45 AM ']
cum get wired!: Come enjoy the best and most magnificent burn on the playa. This year, a very different type of burn is happening. Tiny Dirty Secret is the third installment of a trifecta of art pieces. Little Dirty Secret in 2017 and Big Dirty Secret in 2018. Rather than going big, it's going to be the smallest burn in Burning Man history. Don't be confused by the smallest burn being something that isn't that cool, because that isn't the case. In fact, it's going to be a really badass fireworks show, a great colored fire that will impress most, and gas mines to excite even a seasoned pyro!. It is sure to be a spectacle you don't want to miss! The reason behind this is some of the big pieces of Art are as big as some people's Egos. Not that there is no love for the big art, but this year it will be shown that even a small piece can be as badass as ever and a big Ego can be left at the door. Bye Felicia! So this is the callout for all of you to come and enjoy a fun burn, that means YOU!. Friday night at 11: 59 p.m burn time, come early and get a front row seat! Mark it on your calendars, show up and support something great! Find TDS on the playa during the week and fill out a Dirty Secret card, drop it in the slot. This is a way to anonymously let go and lift the burdens and secrets you hide within. These are things that weigh us down and hold us back from living life we want. Come release yourself, and let go of that shit! Also, bring your Mutant Vehicle, Fire Spinning awesomeness and help the cause, the more the merrier! See You at the Burn!

cum get wired!: Party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our Mighty Ship, the “USS Nevada”, and our infamous ARRGH Bar, open daily from 10:00am to 10:00pm…ish, where we’ll be serving up our special “Se(a)men” and other delicious grogs. Come join us for our 2019 “Theme Parties”. The start of our Party season officially begins on Monday with our “NAKED PIRATE SHOTS” party from Noon to 2pm. Tuesday from 10am to Noon we head down the rabbit hole for our “MAD PIRATE TEA PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, “BLACKBEARD’S BLACKBERRY BASH” serves up our own Blackberry grog. Wednesday from Noon to 2pm, join us for our “MAI TAI PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm we get to wear white with our “WHITE LINEN PARTY”. Thursday from 7am to 9am, stretch out with “MORNING NINYASA YOGA AND MIMOSA”, then from Noon to 2pm our bartender’s “booty” will be on display at our “BOOTY SHORTS PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm our lovely lasses will dazzle you at the “WICKED WENCHES PARTY”, and 4pm to 6pm, our “PIRATES AND MERMAIDS PARTY”. Friday from Noon to 2pm, join us for some “SUNKEN TREASURE TASTY TREATS, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “PIRATE COWBOY PARTY” shows that Pirates are just Cowboys with a different hat. Saturday from 7am to 9am start the day with “MORNING VINYASA YOGA AND SUNRISE SIPPERS”, and then from Noon to 2pm, embrace your inner Basque with our “PICON PUNCH PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “DRAG BALL FASHION SHOW” will surely inspire ALL Kings and Queens. Finally, on Sunday from 10am to Noon, we bring an end to the party with our amazing “BLOODY MARY PARTY”! Daily, we will have morning coffee, and throughout the week we will be hosting Burlesque lessons, Pole Dancing demonstrations, Flogging demonstrations, body painting and more! cum get wired!: This is a highly participatory workshop where women will make and decorate their own sexy Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the playa. Recyclable aluminum is used to hand hammer a custom fit costume using traditional hand metal working techniques handed down by cultures across the ages. Helpers will be available assist as needed, but past camps have shown that participants were all highly successful and delighted with their costumes and new skills. We will have a “dungeon” façade and props set up in the camp, along with our Giant Green Dragon mutant vehicle for a backdrop for the girls to shoot photos of their completed creations. Prop swords, axes and throne furnished for effect. Also new this year will be a body painting station for painting of “tribal tattoos” and theme- based decorative art for participants and accompanying friends. Think Dragons! A special bonus is our Must be Naked to Ride Life-Size Animatronic Dinosaur. Don't miss it. Workshop will be open daily 8am-noon. Construction takes about 2 hours. All materials gifted of course.

cum get wired!: Bikes, beer cans, and missing flip flops are certainly MOOP. Cigarette butts, toothpicks, screws, and sequins are mini-MOOP that we often miss. Stop by to pick up a unique handmade fabric MOOP bag of your very own (made from recycled scraps and old clothing), and learn about Mini-MOOP on the Playa. If you return with a full bag anytime during the week, we will cheer and ring our MOOP Bell (and throw away the MOOP for you), while you get to choose something fabulous and useful from our box of prizes: costume pieces, dust masks, bike locks, bandannas, flashlights, and more.

cum get wired!: Party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our Mighty Ship, the “USS Nevada”, and our infamous ARRGH Bar, open daily from 10:00am to 10:00pm…ish, where we’ll be serving up our special “Se(a)men” and other delicious grogs. Come join us for our 2019 “Theme Parties”. The start of our Party season officially begins on Monday with our “NAKED PIRATE SHOTS” party from Noon to 2pm. Tuesday from 10am to Noon we head down the rabbit hole for our “MAD PIRATE TEA PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, “BLACKBEARD’S BLACKBERRY BASH” serves up our own Blackberry grog. Wednesday from Noon to 2pm, join us for our “MAI TAI PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm we get to wear white with our “WHITE LINEN PARTY”. Thursday from 7am to 9am, stretch out with “MORNING NINYASA YOGA AND MIMOSA”, then from Noon to 2pm our bartender’s “booty” will be on display at our “BOOTY SHORTS PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm our lovely lasses will dazzle you at the “WICKED WENCHES PARTY”, and 4pm to 6pm, our “PIRATES AND MERMAIDS PARTY”. Friday from Noon to 2pm, join us for some “SUNKEN TREASURE TASTY TREATS, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “PIRATE COWBOY PARTY” shows that Pirates are just Cowboys with a different hat. Saturday from 7am to 9am start the day with “MORNING VINYASA YOGA AND SUNRISE SIPPERS”, and then from Noon to 2pm, embrace your inner Basque with our “PICON PUNCH PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “DRAG BALL FASHION SHOW” will surely inspire ALL Kings and Queens. Finally, on Sunday from 10am to Noon, we bring an end to the party with our amazing “BLOODY MARY PARTY”! Daily, we will have morning coffee, and throughout the week we will be hosting Burlesque lessons, Pole Dancing demonstrations, Flogging demonstrations, body painting and more! We also have an awesome “Chill space” with lots of couches and shade, a Wayward Wenches Bazaar, where you can pick up that much needed item, great music, and a rowdy crew of Wenches and Pirates that are always up for the best time possible as we “Belly up to the bar

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 12 PM – 12 AM ']
cum get wired!: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!

cum get wired!: Again this year, YOUniversal will offer a Persian Tea House - designed by Gregg Fleishman (Temple 2013). For 8 hours each day (noon ‘til 8pm) we will offer desert-friendly drinks, hot and cold, along with exotic sweets and sour treats, and some parlor games and poetry / fortune telling all based on the Persian culture. PRO TIP: In addition to our daily Teahouse, come by WEDNESDAY NIGHT, when we host an open Persian dinner! We keep serving amazing hot Persian Food, fluffy saffron infused rice with tadeeg, until we are out of food!! Don't miss this truly amazing opportunity to eat yummy Persian food on the playa!! Since our camp consists of mostly veteran burners of Persian descent, we are really good at two things that can be helpful on the playa, hospitality and fun desert dwelling wisdom. We plan on showcasing both for our fellow burners. As such the YOUniversal Persian Tea House will include a daily variety of ancient Persian favorites, time tested to do well in a desert setting: Drinks & Liquids Persian Tea (optionally with Cardamom) Sekanjebin - Honey / Vinegar + Mint drink served with lettuce dip Sharbeteh Albaloo - Sour Elderberry Sherbet Sharbateh Behleemoo - Quince Lime Sherbet Dough - Yogurt Drink Ab-du-khiar - Cold Yogurt, Cucumber, Herbs, Walnuts and Raisins Soup Sweets & Treats Sohan - Persian Saffron Brittle Noon Nokhod-chee - Chick Pea treats Gaz - Nougat like taffy with pistachos embedded Baghlava - Persian Baklava Zulbia / Bamieh - Sugar-Syrupy Dough Sohan Asali - Persian Almond Brittle Shirini e Zaban - Persian Puff Pastry Ranginak - Date and Walnut squares Lavashak - Sweet or Sour Fruit roll-ups of various kinds Poetry and Parlor Games Takhteh Nard - Backgammon Shat-ranj - Chess Hokm - Persian Card Game Hafez Poetry - Fortune Telling Rumi Poetry Readings

cum get wired!: Giant Ball Sumo Wrestling: 30 minutes of matches beginning at 4:30 pm Giant Ball Couples Counseling at 5:00 pm each day. Main Event: Running of the Balls. Two running games beginning at 5:30 pm All events feature gifts of red bandannas and chilled sangria. Giant Ball Sumo can happen at any time, and often does. Either within our wooden corral or out on the street, two participants square off in a circle, each wearing a giant inflatable ball. Matches usually last only a minute, as the balls get knocked over and roll out of the ring. A taiko drummer provides drama, and there's always one or two ball wranglers on hand to help participants in and out. Couples Counseling, in which two people wearing giant balls (could be more if they're from Poly Paradise!!) try to knock some sense into their partner, with some very non-PC advice being shouted at them by our trained counselors from a bullhorn. Running of the Balls: Each day's activities end with two running games, during which six angry balls are released from our corral into a crowd of red-bandanna-wearing runners. Course flag waivers are positioned around the nearby plaza, and the runners must complete the course and try to survive by not getting knocked down.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Saturday, August 31st, 2019, 5 PM – 6:30 PM ']
cum get wired!: Our camps main attraction is a trampoline suspended from a giant web of bungee cords. The tramp will move in a multitude of directions, and is very reactive to the movements of those who are on it. It will swing, tilt, bounce, gyrate, jiggle, and even rotate in a huge circle. Every action has a reaction, and every motion has an emotion. When burners first enter our dome, they're not quite sure what they are looking at. Climbing a single scaffolding allows entry through the bungee wall, and onto the trampoline. The first impulse is to jump, it's a trampoline after all. But the jump is not what's this is all about. The tramp will shift around in reaction to the participants movements. The first thing that happens, is everyone falls down. Then they start laughing.The braver ones will get up and start moving around. This causes more chaos, and everyone ends up in a big pile. Once again, the more adventurous ones get up again, and this time, they start to figure it out. Jump around, and try to make the others fall. The game is on, and the last one standing wins. We've done this at all hours, and the most hilarious are at dawn, after a long night out when you are most wobbly anyway. Feel free to come by any time for practice runs. We would schedule this for that hour, but we never know who will actually be up then. So we've decided to schedule this for Saturday afternoon, when the week is winding down, and everyone is truly burned. It's a great way to end your burn.

Sugar Kayne’s music wraps itself around you, sending you on a time traveling journey into raw, rapturous regions. The Great Smokey Mountains of North Carolina claim her as a native child of Cherokee descent. She stalks the stage like a hunter after its prey, touching audiences in ways not often explored. Her unvarnished, throaty vocals deliver an other worldly quality that comes from traveling through the spirit world, combining primal rhythms with technology; blending drumming and synthesizer to create raw elements with unhurried bass lines. Sugar Kayne embodies the exotic bohemian, subverting the main stream while she emerges as a cutting edge innovator in music.

The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.

cum get wired!: Carousel Zarya is a rotating, interactive art installation and ride. It is hand-powered, driven by human energy, spits fire and smoke into the sky, combined together music and mechanics, arts, poetry, technology and Halloween spirit. Any citizen of Black Rock City, when tired of passive spectacle elsewhere, can come spin the Carousel and become its motor. The energy transmitted from the human motor overflows into the creativity and joy of the spinning people on the platform. They feel like actors on a stage. Everything is there for you! It's a rotating stage for musicians, steam punk pole for dancing girls, the best wooden animals for children, theatre lights, smoke and fire for actors. We will playing authentic cozy funk from 70s on unusual musical instrument— electro hurdy-gurdy AMbox. What is this? It is like a radio but more than a radio. This is the instrument, on which everybody can play own melody.The Carousel Zarya empowers and inspires creativity and collaboration, returning participants to the free-spirited days of childhood and fantasy.

['Sunday, August 25th, 2019, 12 PM – 3 P: ['Sunday, September 1st, 2019, 10 AM – 12 PM ']
cum get wired!: Party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our Mighty Ship, the “USS Nevada”, and our infamous ARRGH Bar, open daily from 10:00am to 10:00pm…ish, where we’ll be serving up our special “Se(a)men” and other delicious grogs. Come join us for our 2019 “Theme Parties”. The start of our Party season officially begins on Monday with our “NAKED PIRATE SHOTS” party from Noon to 2pm. Tuesday from 10am to Noon we head down the rabbit hole for our “MAD PIRATE TEA PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, “BLACKBEARD’S BLACKBERRY BASH” serves up our own Blackberry grog. Wednesday from Noon to 2pm, join us for our “MAI TAI PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm we get to wear white with our “WHITE LINEN PARTY”. Thursday from 7am to 9am, stretch out with “MORNING NINYASA YOGA AND MIMOSA”, then from Noon to 2pm our bartender’s “booty” will be on display at our “BOOTY SHORTS PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm our lovely lasses will dazzle you at the “WICKED WENCHES PARTY”, and 4pm to 6pm, our “PIRATES AND MERMAIDS PARTY”. Friday from Noon to 2pm, join us for some “SUNKEN TREASURE TASTY TREATS, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “PIRATE COWBOY PARTY” shows that Pirates are just Cowboys with a different hat. Saturday from 7am to 9am start the day with “MORNING VINYASA YOGA AND SUNRISE SIPPERS”, and then from Noon to 2pm, embrace your inner Basque with our “PICON PUNCH PARTY”, and from 2pm to 4pm, our “DRAG BALL FASHION SHOW” will surely inspire ALL Kings and Queens. Finally, on Sunday from 10am to Noon, we bring an end to the party with our amazing “BLOODY MARY PARTY”! Daily, we will have morning coffee, and throughout the week we will be hosting Burlesque lessons, Pole Dancing demonstrations, Flogging demonstrations, body painting and more! We also have an awesome “Chill space” with lots of couches and shade, a Wayward Wenches Bazaar, where you can pick up that much needed item, great music, and a rowdy crew of Wenches and Pirates that are always up for the best time possible as we “Belly up to the bar

cum get wired!: Drop off writings & 2d art for a book on what the feminine means to you. Will be added to book in art piece and later in print. All genders needed. The Ovule Installation is an exploration of the feminine self and the value found there. When we say feminine self we are speaking of a self that exists in every thing and every one of us, regardless of our gender. An Ovule is the part of the ovary of seed plants that contains the female germ cell. The intention of this piece is to ask where the feminine exists within, where and how can Mother Earth /Gaia, the spirit of living earth, be honored, valued, and nurtured.
